sourceDesc.bibl: Śṛṅgāraprakāśaḥ [Sāhityaprakāśaḥ] Bhojarāja Rewāprasāda Dwivedī and Sadāśivakumāra Dwivedī Indira Gandhi National Centre for the Arts New Delhi 2007

div.head: prakṛtyādiśabdaprakāśaḥ
atha
prakṛtyādiśabdaprakāśaḥ

div.p: tat tridhā 1. kriyārūpam, 2. kārakarūpam, 3. upaskārarūpañca | teṣu—
teṣāṃ pratyekaṃ ṣaḍbhedatvāt padasyāṣṭādaśa bhedā bhavanti | teṣu—
(1) bhāvapadam, (2) karmapadam, (3) karttṛpadam, (4) bhāvakarmapadam, (5) bhāvakarttṛpadam, (6) karmakarttṛpadaṃ ceti kriyārūpa—padabhedāḥ | teṣu—

div.head: bhāvapadam
div.p: pacyate, apāci, pakṣyate devadattena; āsyate, āsi, āsiṣyate bhavatā; bhidyate, abhedi, bhitsyate kusūlena; śrāyate, aśrāyi śrāyiṣyate yavāgvā; evaṃ śrāyiṣīṣṭa, śaśre, aśrāyiṣyataudanena; ghāniṣīṣṭa, jaghne, aghāniṣyata hastinā; grāhīṣīṣṭa, jagṛhe, agrāhiṣyata grāheṇa; dārśiṣīṣṭa, dadṛśe, adarśiṣyata preyaseti |

div.head: karmapadam
div.p: pacyate odanaḥ sūdena, āsyate māso bhṛtakena, gamyate grāmaḥ pānthena, supyate krośaḥ śiśunā, akāri kaṭaḥ kuśalena, arodhi gaurgopālena, adohi dhenurvallavena, atāpi pṛthivī rājñā, anvatātapta kitavaḥ karmaṇā, anubabhūve kambalaḥ kareṇa, pakṣyate yavāgūrbhiṣajā, lapsīṣṭa bhikṣā tāpasena |
evaṃ kariṣyate kāritā kāriṣīṣṭa kaṭaḥ, ghāniṣyate ghānitā ghāniṣīṣṭa śatruḥ, grāhiṣyate grāhitā grāhīṣaṣṭa granthaḥ, darśiṣyate darśitā darśiṣīṣṭa preyāniti |

div.head: karttṛpadam
div.p: pacati caitraḥ, āste maitraḥ, tapati suvarṇaṃ suvarṇakāraḥ, tapyate tapasyāpasaḥ, sṛjati mālāṃ mālikaḥ, sṛjate dharmaṃ dhārmikaḥ, udasarji svaṃ vadānyaḥ, udapādi sasyaṃ bhūmiḥ parivārayante vṛkṣaṃ kaṇṭakāḥ, śoṣayate vrīhīnātapaḥ, saṃyujyate gṛhamedhī bhāryayā, pacyate salohitaṃ phalamudumbaraḥ, tathā adīpi, adīpiṣṭa vahniḥ, ajani ajaniṣṭa dhūmaḥ, abodhi abuddha prasuptaḥ, apūri apūriṣṭa kāmaḥ, atāyi atāyiṣṭa dharmaḥ, āpyāyi, āpyāyiṣṭa loka iti |

div.head: bhāvakarmapadam
div.p: icchāmi bhuñjīta bhavān, icchāmi bhuṅktāṃ bhavān, kāmaye yat sa bhuñjīta, prārthaye yadi sa bhañjīta, saṃbhāvayāmi bhuñjīta bhavān, samarthayāmi bhokṣyate bhavān, śraddadhe nābhuṅkta bhavān, avakalpayāmi nābhokṣyata bhavān, na śraddhadhe nanu bhavān vṛṣalaṃ yājayet, nāvakalpayāmi tatrabhavān vṛṣalaṃ yājayiṣyati, na marṣayāmi tatrabhavān vṛṣalamayāyajiṣyat, vigarhe api tatrabhavān vṛṣalaṃ yājayati, smarasi devadatta kaśmīreṣu vatsyāmaḥ, abhijānāsi kaliṅgeṣu yadavasāma, abhijānāsi kaliṅgeṣu śaś‍vadavasāma, smarasi kaśmīreṣu vatsyāma, tatraudanaṃ bhokṣyāmahe, abhijānāsi yat kaliṅgeṣvavasāma yat tatraudanamabhuñjmahi; ehi manye rathena yāsyasi, jāne supto vihāyasā gacchāmi, paś‍ya mṛgo dhāvati, iha paś‍yāmaḥ karmaṇi dvivacanabahuvacanānyudāhniyante iti |

div.head: bhāvakarttṛpadam
div.p: corasya rujati, corasyāmayati, corasya bādhate, corasya pīḍayati, corasya dahati, corasyātaṅkayati, corasya spṛśati, corasya śoṣayati, corasya mardayati, corasya moṭayati, coraṃ jvarayati, coraṃ saṃtāpayati | tathā— bhavati pacati, bhavati pakṣyati, bhavatyapākṣīt, bhavedapi bhavet, syādapi syāt, nāsti rame, ayūyujastvamasi, asi tvamīśiṣe, asti gacchāmo vayam, astyatra kāñcid gāṃ paś‍yati, asi bhavatu gamyate, bhavatu sādhayāma iti |

div.head: karmakarttṛpadam
div.p:
rajyati vastraṃ svayameva, kuṣyati pādassvayameva, avakirate hastī, avākīrṣṭa vā
svayameva, grathnīte mālā, agrathiṣṭa vā svayameva, cīkīrṣate kaṭaḥ, acikīrṣata vā svayameva, namate daṇḍaḥ anaṃsta vā svayameva, ucchrayate daṇḍaḥ, udaśiśriyata vā svayameva, brūte kathā, avocata vā svayameva; prasnute gauḥ prāsnoṣṭa vā svayameva; āhate gauḥ (3.1.89 kāśikā), āvadhiṣṭa vā svayameva | anurundhe gauḥ anvaruddha vā svayameva, akṛta kaṭaḥ svayameva (3.1.62 kāśikā) iti |

bhidyate kusūlaḥ, svayameva, bhidyate rajjuḥ svayameva, lūyate kedāraḥ svayameva, pacyate phalaṃ svayameva, bhajyate kāṣṭhaṃ svayameva, kuṣyate pādaḥ svayameva, adohi gauḥ svayameva, arodhi gauḥ svayameva, ahāvi haviḥ svayameva, akāri kaṭaḥ svayameva, tathā bhūṣayate kanyā svayameva, maṇḍayate kanyā svayameva, dohayate gauḥ svayameva, ārohayate hastī svayameva, darśayate rājā svayameva, abhivādayate guruḥ svayameva, lāvayate kedāraḥ svayameva, pācayate odanaḥ svayameva, bhedayate kusūlaḥ svayameva, kārayate kaṭaḥ svayameva, gaṇayati gaṇaḥ svayameva, smarayati vanagulmaḥ svayameva'iti | āhuś‍ca—

karmavat karmmaṇā tulyakriyaḥ (3.1.87), karmavadabhāve yagātmanepadaciṇ (vad)bhāvāḥ prayojanam (3.1.87 kāśikā) acaḥ karmakarttari (3.1.62), duhaśa‍ca (3.1.63), na rudhaḥ (3.1.64), na duh‍snunamāṃ yak‍ciṇau (3.1.89), yak‍ciṇoḥ pratiṣedho hetumaṇṇiśribruñāmupasaṃkhyānam (3.1.89 vā. 1), bhūṣākarmakirādi (3.1.87), ṇi—śrantha—grantha—bruñātmanepadā—karmakāṇāmupasaṃkhyānam (3.1.89 vā) |

tat tu samyak | tathāhi ‘bhidyate kusūlassvayameva, akāri kaṭaḥ svayamevetyādiṣu karmaṇyeva yak‍ciṇau, svayaṃśabdāttu karmakarttukatvapratītiḥ | arodhi gaussvayameveti rudherapi karmavivakṣāyāṃ ciṇ bhavatyeva arodhi gaurgopāleneti | yadā tu gorātmanepada eva karmakarttutvaṃ tadā arodhi gaurgopāleneti | yadā tu gorātmanepada eva karmakarttṛtvaṃ tadā 'rodhi gaurātmanaiveti bhavati | ya evārtha ātmanaiveti sa svayameveti | arodhīti cok‍te nāśrute karttṛvācini padāntare karmakarttutvaṃ gamyate | tasmādihāpi karmaṇyeva ṇic | bhūṣayate kanyā svayamevetyādiṣu tu ‘ṇoraṇau yat karma ṇau cet sa karttā 'nādhyāye’ (1.3.67) iti phalavati karttaryevātmanepadam | kutastyā tarhyeteṣu karmakarttṛtāprasiddhiḥ ?

lg.l: kriyamāṇaṃ tu yat karma svayameva prasiddhyati |
sukaraṃ svairguṇaiḥ karttuḥ karmakartteti taṃ viduḥ || 1 ||

div.p: karttupadeṣu bhūtapūrvakatvāt tadavadupacāra iti | tathāhi kanyādayo lāvaṇyātiśayādibhirātmabhūṣāyai prasādhanādīn prayuñjate | prayuñjate ca māghādayo mahākavayaḥ—
phalamanayoḥ sukhāsikā lokarañjanaṃ ca | anyathaiko hastipakaiḥ pīḍyeta, dvitīyo dudarśe iti nābhigamyate |

acetaneṣvapi kriyāphalavivakṣāyāṃ tu dṛś‍yate ‘parivārayante vṛkṣaṃ kaṇṭakāḥ, śoṣayate vrīhinātapa’ iti | etena karaṇena tulyakriyaḥ karttā karmavad bhavatītyapi va vaktavyaṃ bhavati | parivārayanti kaṇṭakairvṛkṣaṃ manuṣyāḥ, parivārayante kaṇṭakāḥ svayameveti | tathā ‘duhipacyoḥ sakarmakayoḥ karttā bahulaṃ karmavad bhavatīti na vak‍tavyam | dugdhe gauḥ payaḥ svayameva, payo muñcatīti gamyate | tasmādudumbarassalohitaṃ phalaṃ pacyata iti karmataiva kriyāviśeṣaṇavivakṣitā | udumbaraśabdo 'tra phalavṛttiḥ, udumbaraṃ tat kālena pacyate salohitaguṇaṃ yathā bhavati lohitena pākena sambadhyata iti yāvat karttṛtvavivakṣāyāṃ ca pacatyātmānāmiti | tathā yujeḥ ś‍yan karttari vak‍tavyam, māsaṃ yujyate brahmacārīti | karttṛtvavivakṣāyāṃ tu daivādikatvaṃ na setsyati, karmatvavivakṣāyāṃ tu karmatvaṃ yathā; karttṛtvaṃ tu svayaṃ śabdena gamyata ityalamatiprasaṅgena ||

list.item: bhāvo yathā—iha tairyātam, iha tairāsitam, iha tairbhuktam, iha taiḥ pītam; kṛtaṃ bhavatā, prasuptaṃ bhavatā, sukṛtaṃ bhavatā, susik‍taṃ bhavatā, bhūtaṃ bhavatā, prabhūtaṃ bhavatā, bhaviṣyamāṇaṃ bhavatā, bhūyamānaṃ bhavatā, bhavitavyaṃ bhavatā, bhavanīyaṃ bhavatā, bhavय़ṃ bhavatā, avaś‍yaṃ bhāvyaṃ bhavatā, āśitabhavaṃ bhavatā, īṣadạ̄dhyambhavaṃ bhavatā, durạ̄dhyaṃbhavaṃ bhavatā, svāḍhayaṃbhavaṃ bhavatā, īṣadutthānaṃ bhavatā, sūtthānaṃ bhavatā iti |

karma yathā—prakṛtaḥ kaṭo bhavatā, kṛtaḥ kriyamāṇaḥ kariṣyamāṇo bhavatā, khalu kaṭaḥ karttavyaḥ, kṛtyaḥ, karaṇīyaḥ, kāryaḥ; īṣatkāryaḥ, īṣatkaraḥ kriyārtho bhavatā, īṣadạ̄dhyaṃkaraḥ svạ̄dhyaṃkaraḥ, īṣatpānaḥ somo bhavatā, supānaḥ, duṣpānaḥ; duśśāsano 'ribhirbhavān suyodhanaḥ, duryodhanaḥ, durdarśanaḥ, durdharṣaṇaḥ, durmarṣaṇaḥ, īṣallabhyo janairbhavān, sulabhaḥ, durdarśaḥ iti |

karttā yathā—kṛtavān kaṭam, upeyivān grāmam, vidvān vyākaraṇam, adhīyan pārāyaṇam, dhārayannupaniṣadam, dviṣānnitihāsam, kurvan kaṭam, kaṭaṃ kurvāṇaḥ; viditā janāpavādān prajāgaritāpararātrān, kanyāmalaṅkariṣṇuḥ, divamutpatiṣṇuḥ, grāmamāgāmukaḥ, yoṣāmabhilāṣukaḥ, odanaṃ bubhukṣuḥ, śriyamāśaṃsuḥ, dādirgāḥ, papissomam, avaś‍yaṃdāyī, śataṃdāyī, grāmaṅgāmī, grāmamāgāmī, kaṭaṃ kārako vrajati, odanaṃ pācako vrajatīti |

bhāvakarma yathā— kriyāḥ kriyante, vidhayo vidhīyante, uṣṭrāsikā āsyante, hataśāyikāśśayyante, arhati bhavānikṣubhakṣikām, ikṣubhakṣikāṃ meṃ dhārayasi, vyāvahāsīṃ vidadhate (3.3.43 kāśikā), sāṃkūṭinaṃ kurvanti, utsavamāmantrayai, samājamāmantrayai, āmantraṇamāmantrayai, mantraṇaṃ nimantrayai, kāṃ tvaṃ kārimakārṣīḥ (3.3.110), kāṃ kārikām kāṃ kṛtim kāṃ kriyām, kā kṛtyām; kiṃ kṛtam, sarvāṃ kārimakārṣam, sarvāṃ kārikām, sarvāṃ kṛtim, sarvāṃ kriyāṃ, sarvāṃ kṛtyām, sarvaṃ kṛtamiti |

bhāvakarttā yathā— brahmabhūyaṃ varttate, brahmahatyā na bhavati, pāko varttate, tyāgo bhavati, sāṃrāviṇaṃ varttate, ākhūttho bhavati (3.2.4 mabhā.), anveṣaṇā varttate, vyāvabhāṣī bhavati, samajaḥ paśūnām, udajaḥ paśūnām, gavāmupasaraḥ (3.3. 71), ṛtūnāṃ paryāyaḥ, bhavata āsikā, bhavataḥ śāyikā, abhyūṣakhādikā varttate, ikṣubhakṣikā udapādi, śirorttirvarttate (3.3.108), pravāhikā na bhavati, śirorogaḥ śirobādhate, arocako na bhavati, nigrāhaste vṛṣala (3.3.45 kāśikā), avagrāhaste vṛṣala, ajananiste vṛṣala (3.3.112), abhavaniste vṛṣala bhūyāditi |

karmakarttā yathā— svayaṃ dhauto pādau, svayaṃ vilīnamājyam, akṛṣṭapacyāśśālayaḥ (3.1.114), pacelimā māṣāḥ {3.1. 96(1)}, bhidelimāni kāṣṭhāni, bhidurā bhūḥ, chidurā rajjuḥ, bhaṅguraṃ kāṣṭham, ārohayamāṇo hastī, lūyamānaḥ kedāraḥ,
bruvāṇā kathā, bhūṣamāṇā kanyā, grathnānā strak, śrathnānā strak, cikīrṣamāṇaḥ kaṭaḥ, avakiramāṇo hastī, nayamāno daṇḍaḥ ucchrāyamāṇo daṇḍaḥ, duhānā dhenuḥ, prasnuvānā dhenuḥ, rundhānā gauḥ āghnānā gauḥ, rajyad vastram, kuṣyan pāda iti |

div.p: anye punaramīṣāmapi karmakarttṛtvaṃ manyante—prakṛtaḥ kaṭaṃ bhavān, prakṛtaḥ kaṭo bhavatā, yātaḥ panthānaṃ bhavān, yātaḥ panthā bhavatā, āsīno māsaṃ bhavān, āsīno māso bhavatā, bhuṅkte odanaṃ bhavān, bhukta odane bhavatā, adhiśayitaḥ khaṭvāṃ bhavān, adhiśayitā khaṭvā bhavatā, ārụ̄dho vṛkṣaṃ bhavān, ārụ̄dho vṛkṣo bhavatā, āśliṣṭaḥ priyāṃ bhavān, āśliṣṭā priyā bhavatā, upasthitaḥ sūryaṃ bhavān, upasthitaḥ sūryo bhavatā, upāsito 'gniṃ bhavān, upāsito 'gnirbhavatā, anūṣito guruṃ bhavān (3.4.72 kāśikā), anūṣito gururbhavatā, anujāto māṇavako māṇāvikām, anujātā māṇāvikā māṇavakena, anujīrṇo vṛṣalīṃ devadattaḥ, anujīrṇā vṛṣalī devadattena iti | tanna samyag vāk‍yabhedāt ||
nanu ca bhāvanākṣepalabdhaḥ karttā na tiṅvācyaḥ |
tat kathamucyate karttṛpadaṃ, bhāvakarttṛpadaṃ, karmakarttṛpadaṃ ceti |

tathāhi—anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ śabdasyābhidhānaśaktiḥ kalpyate | bhāvanākṣepeṇa ca pratīyate; karttari na tatra pratyayasyānvayavyatirekau kalpyate, yathā jātyākṣepeṇa vyakteḥ pratītau na tāṃ prati śabdasya vācakaśaktikalpanopapattimatī |
kathaṃ punaḥ kartturanabhidhāne pratyayasya vacanapuruṣabhedo yujyate?
jātyabhidhānapakṣe jāteraliṅgasaṃkhyāyā api tadādhāravyaktyāśrayāṇi liṅgavacanāni pravarttante, tathaiva bhāvanāyā abhede 'pi | tathā kartrāśrayo vacanapuruṣabhedaḥ prapatsyatīti |

na ca karttari lakāraḥ smaryata iti vācyam, yataḥ ‘karttari kṛt’ (3.4.67), ‘laḥ karmaṇi ca bhāve cākarmakebhyaḥ’ (3.4.69), ‘varttamāne laṭ’ (3.2.123), ‘lasya’ (3.4.77, 78) ‘tibādayaḥ’ (1.4. 101), tiṅstrīṇi trīṇi prathamamadhyamottamāḥ tānyekavacanadvivacanabahucānyekaśaḥ yuṣmadi XXX madhyamaḥ, asmadhuttamaḥ, ‘śeṣe prathamaḥ’ (1.4.102—108), ‘bhāvakarmaṇorātmanepadam’ (1.3.13), ‘śeṣāt karttari parasmaipadam’ (1.3.78) ityādivāk‍yānāṃ ‘dv‍yekayordvivacanaikavacane’ (1.4.22), ‘bahuṣu bahuvacanam’ (1.4.21) iti saṃkhyāvidhānena sahaikārthaviṣayatvādekavāk‍yatā vyākhyātā | eko hi
pacatītyādiśabdastairvyākriyate | tatraiṣa vākyārtho bhavati— kartturekatve ekavacanaṃ tibityādi, kartturdvitve dvivacanaṃ tasityādi, kartturbahutve bahuvacanaṃ jhītyādi | evaṃ ca bhāvanākṣiptakarttṛsaṃkhyāyāmeva lakāraḥ smaryate na karttari |

ucyate, yadi bhāvanākṣiptakarttṛsaṃkhyā lakāreṇocyate, devadattenāsyata iti bhāvābhidhāyino 'pi karttṛsaṃkhyāyāmevābhidhānaṃ prāpnoti, ubhayatrāpi karttṛsadbhāvāt | yenaiva hi nimittena pacatītyādau karma saṃkhyābhidhānamāsādayati tenaiva prayogāntare 'pyāsādayet | kataṃ ca karttaryabhidhīyamāne tad‌viśiṣṭasaṃkhyābhidhānaṃ yuk‍tam ?

atha saṃkhyāmātramabhidhīyate na viśeṣaḥ; tarhi puruṣādibhedapratīteranupapattiḥ | tadviśiṣṭā—bhidhānaṃ ca tadabhidhānapurassareṇa nyāyyam, nā 'gṛhītaviśeṣaṇā viśeṣyabuddhirvarttata iti nyāyāt na ca śabdenāsaṃspṛś‍yamāno 'pi karttā sannidhimātreṇa saṃkhyāṃ viseṣāyitumutsahate, saṃkhyāyā dharmarūpatvād dharmiṇā kartturavacchedakatvena saṃsparśo yujyate | karaṇādīnāmapi sānnidhyadharmitvāt tathātvopapatteḥ | kiñca lakāreṇābhihitayorbhāvanāsaṃkhyayoruttarakālo bhāvanākṣip‍taḥ karttā labhyate | tato 'sya pūrvabhāvād bhāvanāsamakālamabhihitayā saṃkhyayā aviśeṣāt sarvakārakāṇāmavacchedaḥ prāpnoti | paś‍cācca karttākṣip‍taḥ kathaṃ bhāvanāsamakālamabhihitāṃ saṃkhyāmātmani nirundhyāt ?
atha saṃkhyāvadabhāvanāpratītisamakālameva karttā pratīyate; na tarhyākṣepalabhyaḥ, apitu saṃkhyāvallakāreṇābhidhīyata eveti |

kiñca devadattādipadena pacatītyādessāmānādhikaraṇyadarśanāt saṃkhyāvān karttaiva lakāreṇābhidhīyate | yadi punaḥ karttṛssaṃkhyānamekatvādikaṃ lakāro brūyāt tadā devadattasya pacatītyevaṃ prayogaḥ syāt yathā devadattasyaikatvamiti | atha na saṃkhyānamucyate lakāreṇa, kintu saṃkhyeya eva devadattādirabhidhīyate | devadattaḥ pacatītyekatvasaṃkhyāvacchinnaḥ pākaṃ karotityarthaḥ | evaṃ caṃ saṃkhyeye 'bhidhīyamāne karttaivābhihito bhavati |
na ca kartrabhidhāne 'pi śakteḥ kārakatvāt samānādhikaraṇā 'nupapattiriti vācyam, śaktirhi lakāreṇāpyabhidhīyamānā guṇadravyaparatantraivābhidhīyate | yathā—‘śuklaḥ paṭaḥ, śuk‍lā śāṭī’—ti |
api ca bhavanto 'pi karma lakāravācyaṃ manyante, tadanupapannam | yathaiva hi bhāvanākṣepalabhyatvāt kartturavācyatvaṃ tathā karmaṇo 'pi bhavitumarhati |

athānākṣepāt karmaṇo vācyatvam | evaṃ ca sati kartturapi tathātvopapattiḥ | na hi kriyākṣepe kartṛkarmaṇorviśeṣamupalabhāmahe | yathaiva hi kartrā vinā kriyā na pratīyate evaṃ karmaṇāpi | na sarvatra karmasambandha iti cet, yatrā 'sti tatra katham ? atha karmaṇo 'pi kriyākṣepalabhyatvāt tadgatā 'pi saṃkhyaivocyate lakāreṇa | kathamidānīṃ karttṛkarmā 'nabhidhāyako lakāraḥ k‍vacit karttṛgatāṃ saṃkhyāmabhidhatte; k‍vacit karmagatāmiti viśeṣo bhavati? na ca viśeṣaṇaṃ nāstīti vācyam, yataḥ pacatītyatra ullasitena karttṛrūpatvena pacyata ityatra rūpagṛhītakarmaniṣṭhatvena pratītirūtpadyate | kiṃ ca lakāraṇe karttṛkarmaṇoranabhidhāne devadattaḥ pacatītyanabhihite karttari tṛtīyā, odanaḥ pacyata iti karmaṇi dvitīyā prāpnoti |

athaivamucyate karttṛkarmmasaṃkhyayorabhihitatvānna bhaviṣyato vibhaktī | kṛdanteṣu tarhyaniṣṭaprāptiḥ saṃkhyāyāḥ kṛtyabhidhānāt | tatra pak‍va odana iti dvitīyā, paktā devadatta iti tṛtīyā prāpnoti |

nanu cobhayaṃ vibhak‍tyarthaḥ saṃkhyā karmmādayaś‍ca | tatra yathā ' 'khyāteṣu saṃkhyāyā abhihitatvāt karttṛkarmmaṇordvitīyātṛtīye na bhavataḥ, tathā kṛdanteṣu kārakasyā 'bhihitatvāt saṃkhyā, saṃkhyāyā dvitīyādayo na bhaviṣyanti |

syādetat | yadyabhihite pratiṣedhaḥ syāt, anabhihite tvayaṃ vidhiḥ sāmarthyaikavāk‍yatābhyāṃ paryudāsāśrayaṇāt | tatra tiṅnteṣu saṃkhyābhidhāne 'pyanabhihitatvāt kartṛkarmaṇoḥ kārakavibhaktiḥ prāpnoti | kṛdanteṣu kārakābhidhāne 'pi anabhihitatvāt saṃkhyāyāḥ kārakavibhak‍tayaḥ prāpnuvanti | api ca ‘devadattaḥ pacan, devadattaḥ pacamāna’ iti śatṛśānacoḥ karttari ca saṃkhyāyā apyanabhidhānāt tṛtīyā na prāpnoti ? atha śatṛśānacoḥ karttṛnabhidhānamāśrīyate tiḍaḥ kimaparāddham ? tasyāpi lādeśatvāt śatṛśānacoḥ kṛttvāt, ‘karttari ca kṛt’ (3.4.67) iti vacanāt; kartturabhidhānāditi cet karmaṇaḥ kathamodanaṃ pacyamāna iti | atha sthānino lakārasya karmaṇi vidhānāt tadādeśatvācca śānacaḥ karmābhidhānaṃ bhaviṣyati | tathāhi ‘laḥ karmaṇi ca bhāve cākarmakebhyaḥ’ (3.4.69) iti, ‘bhāvakarmaṇoḥ’ (1.13.13), ‘ātmanepadam’ (1.3.12) iti vā karmaṇi lakāro vidhīyate | evaṃ sati yatrāpi tiṅo 'pi vidhīyante tatrāpi karmaṇi prāpnoti | tataś‍ca karttaryati kenāpavāryate ?
tatrāpi ‘karttari kṛt’ (3.4.67), ‘śeṣāt kartari parasmaipadam’ (1.3.78) iti karttari lakāro 'pi vidhīyate | taduktam—

na ca karttari yā karmaṇi yā saṃkhyā tatra tiṅo bhavantītyāśrayitumucitam | na hi ‘laḥ karmaṇi ca bhāve cākarmakebhyaḥ’ (3.4.69) ityasya ‘dvyekayordvivacanaikavacane’ (1.4.22) ‘bahuṣu bahuvacanam’ (1.4.21) ityanenaikavāk‍yatvaṃ vidyate, bhāve 'pi lakārasya vidhānāt | na ca bhāvasya sādhyatvena saṃkhyāyogo 'sti | nāpi ‘svaujasa’ (4.1.2) ityādervidhānasya saṃkhyāvibhaktividhānena sahaikavāk‍yatvam asaṃkhyebhyo 'pyavyayebhyassubutpatteḥ | āha ca mahāvārttikakāraḥ ‘sup‍tiṅoraviśeṣavidhānād dṛṣṭaviprayogācca niyamārthaṃ vacanam’ {1.4.21(1)} iti | mahābhāṣyakāro 'pyāha—‘sup‍tiṅo 'viśeṣeṇotpadyante, utpannānāṃ niyamaḥ’ iti | tasmānna kartṛkarmasaṃkhyāyāṃ lakāravidhiḥ, apitu karttṛkarmaṇorevetyabhyupagantavyam |

ucyate, tayoreva prādhānyāt | tatra karttuḥ prādhānyam, karaṇādīnāṃ tadadhīnavṛttitvāt karmaṇastu tadarthatvameva tatpravṛtteḥ | yadi vā karttṛkarmavyāpārābhidhāyino dhātoḥ para upajāyamāno lakāraḥ karttṛkarmaṇī evābhidadhāti |
atha kathaṃ karttṛkarmavat kālādikamapi nābhidadhāti? viṣayabhedāt | tathāhi ṣaḍarthāstiṅantena pratīyante — (3.1.67 mabhā.)
1. kriya, 2. kālaḥ, 3. upagrahaḥ, 4. kārakaṃ, 5. puruṣaḥ, 6. saṃkhyeti |

teṣu ‘kriyākālātmanepadanimittāni prakṛtirabhidhatte, pratyayaḥ sādhanaṃ saṃkhyāṃ puruṣaṃ ca | tatra prakṛtyabhidheyeṣu kriyā pradhānam, kālopagrahau viśeṣaṇam | pratyayābhidheyeṣu sādhanaṃ pradhānaṃ, saṃkhyāpuruṣau viśeṣaṇam |
kathaṃ punaḥ saṃkhyā kārakasyaiva viśeṣaṇam, na kriyākālopagrahapuruṣāṇām ?

ucyate, kriyāyāḥ sādhyatvenāpariniṣpannatvāt kālasya ca kriyāto 'vyatirekāt, vyatireke 'pi vā kriyāvacchedakatvenopasarjanatvāt | upagrahasyāpi gandhanādeḥ kriyādharmatvenā 'pariniṣṭhitatve anidantānirdeś‍yatvādasaṃbandhaḥ saṃkhyāyāḥ | puruṣastu prathamādiḥ sādhanameva, nānyaḥ kaś‍cit | ataḥ kārakeṇaiva saṃkhyābhisaṃbadhyate, na kriyādibhiriti | tadevaṃ tiṅvācyatvena karttuḥ karttṛpadaṃ, bhāvakarttṛpadaṃ, karmakarttṛpadaṃ ceti yaduk‍taṃ tadupapannameveti |

karttṛpadaṃ, karmapadaṃ, karaṇapadaṃ, saṃpradānapadam, apādānapadam adhikaraṇapadaṃ ceti kārakarūpabhedāḥ | tatra kartrādayaḥ kārakaprastāve 'grataḥ prapañcayiṣyante; iha tu saṃbandhāvicchedā leśata udāhriyante | teṣāṃ—
karttā tridhā 1. svatantraḥ 2. asvatantraḥ 3. karmakartta ceti |
(1. svatantraḥ) tatra (svatantraḥ) kriyāyāṃ svecchayā karaṇādikārakāṇi yaḥ prayuṅkte, na tu taiḥ prayujyate saḥ svatantraḥ | sa dvidhā 1. svavibhaktivācyaḥ, 2. paravibhaktivācyaś‍ceti |

lg.l: mānabhaṅgapaṭunā suratecchāṃ tanvatā prathayatā dṛśi rāgam |

div.p: (2. asvatantraḥ) yo 'nyaprayuktaḥ kriyāsu vyāpriyate so 'svatantraḥ | so 'pi dvidhā— 1. udbhūtavyāpāraḥ 2. anudbhūtavyāpāraś‍ca |

lg.l: saṅgataṃ ca dayitaiḥ sma nayanti prema kāmapi bhuvaṃ pramadānām || 8 ||
svayaṃ pradugdhe 'sya guṇairupasnutā vasūpamānasya vasūni medinī || 10 ||

div.p: kartuḥ kriyayā 'nanyārthayā yadāpyate tat karma | tadapi tridhā—

div.head: nirvartyam
div.p: (1) nirvartyam — ‘yadasajjāyate sad vā janmanā tat prakāśate’ || 11 || (vāpa. 3.7.49) tayoḥ prathamaṃ yathā—

lg.l: krodhaṃ prabho! saṃhara saṃhareti yāvad giraḥ khe marutāṃ caranti |
tāvat sa vahnirbhavanetrajanmā bhasmāvaśeṣaṃ madanaṃ cakāra || 14 ||

div.head: prāpyam
div.p: tatra yat kṛtya—kta—khala—rthādibhira—bhidhīyate tat kathitam | yat tairnābhidhīyate tadakathitam | tayorādyaṃ yathā—
kriyāsiddhau sādhakatamatvena yadavyavahitaṃ vyāpriyate tat karaṇam | tadapi tridhā —1. bāhyam 2. ābhyantaraṃ 3. bāhyābhyantaraṃ ca |

lg.l: gatayā puraḥ pratigavākṣamukhiṃ dadhatī ratena bhṛśamutsukatām |

div.p: kriyākāryatvenāvadhāritaṃ karmaṇā kriyayā vā saṃyogaṃ yadanubhavati tat sampradānam | tat tridhā 1. dadātikarmavyāpyam, 2. karmamātravyāpyam, 3. kriyāvyāpyañceti | teṣu—
(1) dadātikarmavyāpyaṃ dvidhā 1. svatvasyā 'nivṛttau 2. nivṛttau ca tayorādyaṃ yathā—

lg.l: dātuṃ vā prabhavasi māmanyasyai karttumeva vā dāsam |
nāhaṃ punastathā tvaṃ yathā hi māṃ manyase bhīru || 25 ||

div.p: (2) kriyākarmavyāpyaṃ dvidhā dadātyarthaviṣayam adadātyarthaviṣayaṃ ca | tatra prathamaṃ yathā—

lg.l: asmin ratiśramanudaś‍ca sarojavātāḥ smarttuṃ diśanti na divaḥ surasundarībhyaḥ || 26 ||
śaśaṃsa tasmai praṇipatya nandī śuśrūṣayā śailasutāmupetām |
na srajo rurucire ramaṇībhyaś‍candanāni virahe madirā vā |

div.p: tatra kartrā karmaṇā vā kriyājanyameva dhrauvyeṇa yadvibhāgamavagāhate tadapādānam | tattridhā — 1. nirdiṣṭaviṣayam 2. upāttaviṣayam 3. apekṣitakriyaṃ ceti |
(1) teṣu nirdiṣṭaviṣayaṃ dvidhā— ujjhitam anujjhitaṃ ca |

lg.l: cyutaṃ na karṇādapi kāminīnāṃ śirīṣapuṣpaṃ sahasā papāta || 30 ||
karau dhunānā navapallavākṛtī vṛthā kṛthā mānini mā pariśramam |
upeyuṣī kalpalatābhiśaṅkayā kathaṃ nu vitrasyati ṣaṭpadāvalī || 32 ||

div.p: (3) apekṣitakriyamapi dvidhaiva— sāmānyāpekṣaṃ viśeṣāpekṣaṃ ca | tayorādyaṃ yathā—

lg.l: yoṣidityabhilalāṣa na hālāṃ dustyajaḥ khalu sukhādapi mānaḥ || 34 ||
kiṃ tena mugdhe madanotsave 'smin kāmaṃ tvayā veśmani lekhayāmi || 35 ||

div.p: kartrā karmaṇā vyavahitaṃ kriyādhāro 'dhikaraṇam | tattridhā—1. vaiṣayikaṃ, 2. aupaśleṣikaṃ, 3. naimittikaṃ ca | teṣu —

lg.l: vipadi dhairyamathābhyudaye kṣamā sadasi vākpaṭutā yudhi vikramaḥ |
yaśasi cābhirucirvyasanaṃ śrutau prakṛtisiddhamidaṃ hi mahātmanām || 37 ||
sannatiṃ dadhati peturajasraṃ dṛṣṭayaḥ priyatame śayane ca || 38 ||
sarvathāpi dadṛśe vanitānāṃ darpaṇeṣviva mukheṣu madaśrīḥ || 39 ||

div.p: pravṛttaprayojakastu nimittaviśeṣo hetuḥ kartā ca bhavati |

div.head: adṛṣṭaprayojyakriyaḥ
div.p: tayoḥ kaṃsaṃ ghātayati, puṣyeṇa candraṃ yojayatītyādiradṛṣṭaprayojyakriyaḥ | sa yathā —

div.head: dṛṣṭaprayojyakriyaḥ
div.p: ārātri vivāsamācaṣṭe rātrīrvivāsayati, māhiṣmatyāṃ sūryamudgamayati, ityādirdṛṣṭaprayojyakriyaḥ | sa yathā—

lg.l: ratiparicayanaśyannaidratandraḥ kathañcid gamayati śayanīye śarvarīṃ kiṃ karotu || 47 ||

div.p: kathaṃ punaḥ kaṃsaṃ ghātayati kathakaḥ, baliṃ bandhayati gāthaka ityādau prayojakavyāpāreṇa ṇijutpattiḥ? ucyate—

teṣāṃ cotpattiprabhṛti āvināśāt samṛddhimācakṣāṇaḥ parānapi tathaiva pratyāyayati | tathā hi vaktāro bhavanti ‘gaccha hanyate kaṃsaḥ, kiṃ gatena hataḥ kaṃsa’ iti | evaṃ rātriṃ vivāsayatītyādāvapi tathā pratyāyanamavagantavyam | ayaṃ ca sūtrānārambhapakṣe nyāyaḥ | sūtrārambhapakṣe tu ākhyānāt kṛtastadācaṣṭe kṛlluk prakṛtipratyāpatiḥ prakṛtivacca kārakam ityudāhṛtaṃ purastāt |

athāyaṃ ṇijartho dhātvarthatvenāvacchidyamānaḥ kiṃ sākṣādavacchidyate? evaṃ bhavitumarhati; na hyanyadihopalabhyate | tadanupapannam | kriyayoḥ sādhyatvena svasādhanāpekṣayā paraspareṇa sambandhaḥ | astu tarhi karturvyavadhānena | ayuktaṃ caitat | dhātvartho hi kartṛvyāpārarūpaḥ, so 'nupalabhyamānamapi kartāramākṣipya tad‍dvāreṇa pratyayārthaṃ viśeṣayati |

na caivaṃ sati preraṇānarthakyaṃ, yato vicchedamāśaṅkamānaḥ kriyāyāṃ pravṛttamapi prerayati | yatrāpyapravṛtta eva pravartyate tatrāpi yogyatvādbuddhisthaṃ kriyāsambandhaṃ gṛhītvā prayuṅkte | buddhinibandhano 'pi kriyākartrossambandha upapadyate | tadāpyākhyānāt kṛtastadācaṣṭa ityādyupasaṃkhyānaṃ ‘na vā sāmānyakṛtatvāddhetuto hyaviśiṣṭam’ iti buddhinibandhanatvenaiva pratyākhyātam | tadā ca buddhikaṃso buddhivāsudevena hanyata ityevaṃbhūtabuddhiviṣayaṃ prayojakavyāpāramāśritya punarbauddha eva prayojakavyāpāro 'ṅgīkṛtaḥ | atho 'rthākṣiptakartṛsaṅgatāyā dhātvabhihitāyāḥ kriyāyāḥ pratyayārthatvena preraṇādinā sambandha iti | ata eva pravṛtto 'pi preṣyamāṇe loḍādipratyayotpatteḥ kartṛtvasyāpāyāt | nanu kathamapravṛttabāhyayogaḥ kartṛtvamupeyāt | praiṣasādhyaṃ ca kartṛtvaṃ kathaṃ nāma tataḥ prāgeva bhavet ? ucyate; nedaṃ bāhyaprayogapravṛttyadhīnaṃ kartṛtvamabhidhīyate | kriyāyāṃ tu sambadhyamānatvena vivakṣitāyāṃ tatsādhyatānāntarīyakaḥ sāmarthyaprāpitasannidhānaḥ kartā sthita eva prayojakavyāpāreṇa bāhyaprayogasiddhyarthameva viṣayīkriyate | anyathā prayojakavyāpārāpekṣakartṛtve prayojakottarakālamevāsya kartṛtvaṃ bhavediti na saṃprati kartṛtvābhāve tannibandhano loḍādirupapadyate | tasmātpacatītyādinā yaḥ pacati sa pākaṃ prati pravartayatviti kathitaṃ bhavati | kriyāsāmarthyādenaṃ nirjñātaṃ kartāraṃ praiṣyatayābhidheyabhāvena lakāro 'bhiniviśate | tathā hi— so 'yaṃ pākādidhātvarthasāmarthyādavagataḥ kartā sādhanatvārthasya bāhyaprayogasaṃpattyarthapreṣaṇādivyāpāraviṣayīkṛtaḥ pratyayenābhidhīyata ityāmananti |

bhavatu nāma kriyāprāpitasannidhānaḥ kartā | sa tu niyata eva puruṣaḥ kathaṃ jñāyate, yenaivamucyate yastvaṃ pacasi sa pākaṃ pravartayeti | ata eva bhāṣye sakriyasya kartuḥ prayoge ṇicamabhidhāya dravyamātrasya prayoge loṭa utpattirabhihitā—pṛcchatu mā bhavān, anuyuṅktāṃ mā bhavān iti | ucyate dravyamātramapi preṣyamāṇaṃ kriyāsādhanayogyameva preṣyate, na kāṣṭhakuḍyādi | nanvevaṃ ṇico loṭaś‍ca viṣayasaṅkara prāp‍noti? nāsti saṅkaraḥ; yasyāvagatamasakṛt pramāṇāntareṇa kriyākartṛtvamasāveva sambhāvitakriyo ṇijviṣayaḥ | adṛṣṭakriyāsāmarthyaṃ tu yogyameva dravyamātraṃ loḍ‍‌viṣaya iti | tena pacetyayamarthaḥ yastvaṃ pacasi pākārhaḥ pāke śaktaḥ sa tvaṃ pravartaya pākamiti | evaṃ ca kriyākartṛtvena yogyatayā jñāyamānasya prayoge pravartyamānatvāt
karturevādhikāra ityuktaṃ bhavati | kiṃ ca ‘vidvacchūrābhijātakartṛke rājye bhavānadhikṛta’ ityādivacanabhaṅgibhirayamevārthassamarthyate |
yadi tarhi na kartādhikriyate nāyaṃ matimān viśiṣṭameva puruṣamevaṃprakāre 'dhikāre 'nurundhīta yameva kañcitpuruṣamupādadīta |

athavā ete loḍādiviṣayāḥ praiṣādiviṣayāḥ | te kasya dharmabhūtāḥ, tatraiva te varṇayanti ‘prayok‍tuḥ (iti)’; prayoktā hi preṣaṇādibhirabhimatasiddhaye 'bhilāṣāt puruṣaṃ pravartayati; sa ca k‍vacit preṣayan, k‍vacidadhyeṣayan, k‍vacidāmantrayamāṇa iti śabdasyaite vyāpārā ityapare |
preṣaṇā hi sarvavidhyādisādhāraṇarūpā | sā ca śabdavyāpāraḥ, nimantraṇādayastu pramāṇādinibandhanāstadviśeṣāḥ | tathā hi — idaṃ nimantraṇaṃ, iyamanujñā, ayaṃ prāptakāla iti prakaraṇāderavagamyate |
anyanmataṃ prayojyavyāpāraviśeṣāḥ; te cāsaṃviditāḥ; sa tu puruṣo liṅādiprayogād bhojanādikriyāsu nimantraṇādyavasthāntaramātmānaṃ manyate nimantrito 'hamadhyeṣito 'hamiti |

anye tvāhuḥ — vidhireka evārthaḥ pratyayasya | sa ca yajetetyāderyathārūpo 'vagamyate tathārūpa eva | kaṭaṃ kuru; iha karotyarthātmake vidhivaddhātvarthānuyāyinīti kārakāṇāmabhisaṃbandhaḥ | yataḥ karotyarthātmakavyāpāreṇa kārakāṇāṃ viśeṣa upajāyamāna upalabhyate; kurvan hi kārako bhavati |

anye tvāhuḥ — yo 'yaṃ pākādiko viśeṣa itaretaravailakṣaṇyenopalabhyamānaḥ pratiniyataphalajanakaḥ, yatraiva phalasādhakatvāt karaṇāni pravartante tasyaiva tu vyāpārātmakatvāt kriyārūpatāpi saṃpannaiveti |

aparamataṃ — tanna vivek‍tuṃ śakyam iha kārakāṇi vyāpriyante, na vyāpriyanta iti, ubhayātmake vastuni viśiṣṭopādhirūpasya anirdhāritatvādekatrāpi pravṛttimupayat kārakamitaratrāpi pravṛttamivopalabhyate |

athāpare bruvate ubhayātmakameva hi kriyārūpaṃ vastu kārakaissaṃpadyate | ata eva ‘kārakāṇāṃ pravṛttiviśeṣaḥ kriyā’ ityetadbhāvanāpakṣe 'pi saṅgacchate, na cāsmābhissakaladhātvarthānuyāyikarotyartharūpā bhāvanā aṅgīkriyate, yaditthamadhyagīṣata kṛbhvastayaḥ kriyāsāmānyavacanāḥ, kriyāviśeṣavacanāḥ pacyādaya iti | kiṃtu pratyayavācyatvamasyā anukṛṣyate |
nanu ca bhāvanāpakṣeṃ kārakāṇāmiti bahuvacanānupapattiḥ, kartureva hi vyāpāro bhāvanā, na kārakāṇāmucyate | kartaiva kārakaśabdenoktaḥ, na punaritarakaraṇādi | kartṝṇāṃ tu kriyābhedena bahuvacanam |

kathaṃ punaridaṃ jñāyate ? yato bhujikriyāmūrīkṛtyedamabhidhatte | anyathā kārakāṇi śuṣkaudane pravartante anyathā māṃsaudana iti kartaiva śuṣkaudane mandaprasthānena pravartate, māṃsaudane saṃrambheṇātaḥ karturmandatāsaṃrambhapradarśanaṃ jñāyate | kartaiva parigrahītā, yasya buddhyanuṣaṅgāt tathāpravṛttiḥ |
nanu ca śuṣkaudanamāṃsaudanayoḥ karaṇādhikaraṇādīnāmapi tadbhedanimittaṃ bahuvacanaṃ bhaviṣyati |

naivam; vidyamānamapi kārakāntaraṃ kāṃsyapātrādiśuṣkamāṃsaudanayormandanayā saṃrambheṇa vā pravartate | yadāpi sakalakārakavyāpāraḥ kriyeti pakṣastadāpi pradhānatvāt kartaiva kārakaśabdenocyate, tasya ca sarvakriyāviśeṣaviṣayatvenānapāyāt prayogapravṛttihetutvācca | karma punaḥ yadyapi tadarthatvāt pravṛtteḥ pradhānaṃ tathāpi tasyāsarvaviṣayatvānna kārakāṇāmiti bahuvacanena saṅgrahaḥ | yadyevaṃ kartṛśabda eva kasmānna kṛtaḥ? karmaṇi lakārāṇāṃ tasya vyudāso mā bhūt | tena yatra saṃbhavati karma tatrāṅgīkṛtameva tu tadapekṣayā bahuvacanam |
nanu ca saṃrambhādipradarśanādacetanavyāpārasya kriyātvaṃ na prāp‍noti |

naivam; saṃrambhādeḥ kartṛvilabhaṇatvāt | ataḥ kartṛvyāpāraḥ kriyeti siddham | nanvevaṃ sati bhāṣyaṃ na saṃgacchate ‘kaḥ paceḥ pradhānārthaḥ, yā 'sau taṇḍulānāṃ viklittiḥ’ iti | ārthaṃ prādhānyamāśritya tadbhāṣyamityavirodhaḥ | yattadarthaḥ ‘preṣaṇaṃ, adhyeṣaṇaṃ vā sa sarvaḥ pacyartha’ iti | evaṃ ca pacatītyākhyātasya viklittyupasarjanaṃ vikledanamartho bhavati |

anye tu kārakāṇāmiti bahuvacanaṃ sarvakārakavyāpāratvena vyācakṣate, yasmātsarvakārakavyāpārābhidhāyitvaṃ dhātūnāṃ dṛśyate | tathā ca devadattasya kāṣṭhaissthālyāmodanasya ca pācakaḥ ityādau sarvāṇyeva kārakāṇi dhātvarthasya viśeṣaṇam; nātra kasyaciduṇabhāvaḥ pradhānabhāvo vā avagamyate |
ākhyātāstarhi sarvakārakavyāpārāḥ kimiti nāvagamyante? prādhānyātkartṛkarmaṇoreva lakārotpatteḥ tadvyāvyāpāra evākhyātātpratīyate |

kiṃ punassarveṣāṃ kārakāṇāmekā pravṛttiḥ? āhosvit pratikārakaṃ bhinnāḥ pravṛttayaḥ kriyeti | na tāvadādyaḥ pakṣaḥ, sarveṣāmekasyāḥ pravṛtterasaṃbhavāt | na hi yaiva kāṣṭhānāṃ pravṛttissaiva devadattasya sthālyādeś‍ca saṃbhavati, tasmātpratikārakaṃ bhinnāḥ pravṛttayo dhātunā yugapadabhidhīyamānāḥ kriyetyucyante |

athavā punarastvekaikā sarvakārakāṇāṃ pravṛttiḥ kriyā | tathā hi sarvaireva kārakairekā pravṛttirupajanyate sarvāṇyeva hi phalajananāya pravartante | kiñcittu kenacidrūpeṇa janayatītyavāntarabhedātkaraṇādivyapadeśaḥ, ekaś‍cānekatra vṛttirjātivadupapadyate | viśeṣād‍vāsyāḥ phalajananarūpatvaṃ, na punaradhiśraṇādirūpateti |

viśeṣaṇādirūpaṃ nipātādirūpaṃ, ākhyātādirūpaṃ, saṃbodhanādirūpaṃ, hetvādirūpaṃ cetyupaskārarūpā | ete cāgrata upaskārārthaprastāve prapañcato varṇayiṣyanta iti neha pratanyante (dra. pṛ. 265) | saṃbandhāvicchedārthaṃ tu leśata udāhriyante | tatra —

div.head: viśeṣaṇādayaḥ
div.p: viśeṣaṇādayaḥ kriyāviśeṣaṇaṃ, kārakaviśeṣaṇaṃ, upasargaś‍ca; yathā— sādhu pacati, bhīṣmamudāraṃ darśanīyaṃ kaṭaṃ karoti, ehi manye rathena yāsyatīti |

div.head: nipātāḥ
div.p: nipātāḥ karmapravacanīyāḥ avyayāni ca, yathā— ahaṃ ca tvaṃ ca vṛtrahan, asāṃprataṃ jetumityādayaḥ |

div.head: ākhyātāni
div.p: ākhyātāni kṛtastaddhitāś‍ca, yathā— smarasi devadatta kaś‍mīreṣu vatsyāmaḥ, raipoṣaṃ puṣyati, brāhmaṇavad bravīti |

div.head: sambodhanādayaḥ
div.p: sambodhanādayaḥ āmantraṇamavadhibhāvo liṅgaṃ ca, yathā— he devadatta, bhuktā vrajatīti, sa iti | saṃbandhādayaś‍śeṣa iti, upapadam, sahārthaś‍ca, yathā— rājñaḥ, puruṣaḥ, kuśalaṃ devadattāyeti, putreṇa sahāyāta iti |

div.head: hetvādayaḥ
div.p: hetvādayo heturlakṣaṇaṃ tādarthyaṃ ca, yathā— vidyayā yaśaḥ, kamaṇḍalunā chātraḥ, yūpāya dārviti |

yathā— bījena sasyaṃ, tapasā kṛśaḥ, annena vasati, vratena brāhmaṇyam | kārakaṃ yathā— devadattaḥ śraddhayā tīrthe hemaśataṃ niṣkaṃ brāhmaṇāya dadāti | yadyevaṃ dravyādiviṣayatvena sahārthatvād hetorabhedaḥ prāp‍noti |
sahārtho 'pi dravyādiviṣayatvena kriyāyāmaniyata eva bhavati | yathā— putreṇa saha gomān, putreṇa saha sthūlaḥ, putreṇa sahāgacchati, putreṇa saha brāhmaṇa iti |
naivam; na hi sahārthasya dravyādīn prati niva(rva)rtanabhāvaś‍śabdenocyate | hetoḥ punarāśritavyāpārasyāpi tṛtīyādibhiḥ so 'pi vidhīyata iti kriyāviṣayaḥ karaṇātkathaṃ bhidyata iti cet,
kāryasya kāraṇaṃ prati prayojakatvaṃ tādarthyam; viśiṣṭaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāva iti yāvat | yaddhi yadarthaṃ tanniyogatastasya kāraṇaṃ yathā aṅgulīyāya kanakamiti |
yataḥ kāraṇasya kāryaprasavayogyatā hetutvam; kāryasya kāraṇaṃ prati prayojakatvaṃ tādarthyamiti | ayaṃ ca viśeṣaḥ kāryavācina eva tādarthye caturthī kāryavācino nimittavācinaś‍ca hetostu tṛtīyeti |
na ca tādarthyacaturthyā bādhyate, viṣayabhedāt; kāryavācino hi tṛtīyā, caturthī kāraṇavācina iti |
kathaṃ ca saṃbandhe vidhīyamānā caturthī kāryaśabdādeva, na kāraṇaśabdāt |

api ca bhinnādhikaraṇatvāt saṃbandhasya, yathā rājñaḥ puruṣa iti dviṣṭhamapi saṃbandhaṃ rājaśabdādutpadyamānā ṣaṣṭhī upādhatte | tathā kāryopajanita— vyatirekādutpadyamānā caturthyubhayamapi saṃbandhamupādhāsyate iti |

naivam; tasmai tadarthamiti sarvanām‍nā yo 'rthaḥ pratipadyate sa eva svakāraṇāpekṣayā prāpitavyatirekaś‍caturthyā saṃbadhyate | yathā— yadarthamasya mantraḥ tadanenādhigatamiti sarvanāmārtha eva kāryayogī, tathehāpi tacchabdopātta evārthaḥ prayojanatayā vipariṇataḥ; tadarthaṃ śabdo nābhidhīyate |

bhāvapratyayānto 'pyasau kāryagatameva rūpaṃ viśeṣeṇācaṣṭe, kāryasya kāraṇaṃ prati prayojakatvaṃ tādarthyamiti | tatkathaṃ kārakasya tādarthyavibhaktirāśaṅkyeta ? kāryasthayā 'pi caturthyobhayagatasyāpi saṃbandhasyāvagatatvāt avyatiriktapratipadikārthābhinnaḥ kāraṇaśabdād bhavati, na tu vyatirekalakṣaṇā tṛtīyeti | ayaṃ ca hetutādarthyayorviśeṣaḥ |

vāsenādhīte, adhyayanena vasatīti, yā ca yūpāya dāru, adhyayanāya vasatīti | yastu manyate tadarthatā tadarthatā tadviṣayasya pārarthyarūpā, kāryaprasavayogyatā hetuḥ, ananyārthasya tādarthyam, tasya tadviṣayasyeti ananyārthasyeti viśeṣaṇadvayamapārtham, ubhayatrāviśeṣāt | yadi tāvadarthasyānanyārthatā tādarthyam tadasat | kanakasya valayādāvapi sāmarthyaṃ, saṅghātāt | athoktidharmeṇa, taddhetāvapi samānam | na hi vidyāyā yaśohetutāṃ muk‍tvā kāryāntarayogyatāṃ brute | pārārthyarūpetyapi na vacanīyaṃ, kāryaprasavayogyatetyanenaiva gatārthatvāt | nanu ca naṭasya
śrṛṇotītyādai kāryaprasavayogyasyāpi naṭādeḥ pārārthyena vivakṣāyāṃ mā bhuddhetutvamiti viśeṣaṇaṃ kriyate | naivam; yathā upādhyāyādadhīta iti upādhyāyādeḥ parārthatvena kārakatvaṃ, prayojakatvameva ca tādarthyamiti |

atha lakṣaṇasya kā vārtā ? lakṣaṇamapi tādarthyavaddhetuviśeṣa eva | siddho hi hetuḥ kārako jñāpakaś‍ca | tatra kārakasya svavyāpārānāśrayaṇe heturityākhyā, jñāpakasya lakṣaṇamiti; padārthāntaraparicchedahetutā hi lakṣaṇārthaḥ | taduktam—

k‍vacittu heturapi lakṣaṇaṃ bhavati; yathā 'śākalyasya saṃhitāmanu prāvarṣat, anaḍud‌yajñamanvasiñcat, prajāḥ parjanya iti | etena vṛkṣaṃ prati vidyotate (vidyud) iti dravyalakṣaṇam, jaṭābhistāpasa iti itthaṃbhūtalakṣaṇam, akṣṇā kāṇa iti vikāralakṣaṇaṃ, vātāya kapilā vidyudityutpātalakṣaṇaṃ, goṣu duhyamānāsu gata iti bhāvalakṣaṇaṃ, pacannāsta iti kriyālakṣaṇaṃ ca vyākhyātamiti |
saṃskṛtaṃ śrautam, ārṣaṃ, laukikaṃ ca | teṣu —

lg.l: tadeva śukramamṛtaṃ tadāpassa prajāpatiḥ || 53 || tad brahma |

p.emph: śaṃ yo manuṣyāṇāṃ rāgadvaḥ samṛddho bhavati | tatrānyeṣāmadhipatiḥ sarveṣāṃ manuṣyakaiḥ kāmaissaṃpannatamaḥ | sa manuṣyāṇāṃ parama ānandaḥ |

div.p: ārṣaṃ dvidhā smṛtiḥ purāṇaṃ ca | tayoḥ

lg.l: śūdraiva bhāryā śūdrasya sā ca svā ca viśaḥ smṛte |
te ca svā caiva rājñastu tāś‍ca svā cāgrajanmanaḥ || 54 ||
bhaya bhrāntaisturaiś‍cakre tasyai tasyai diśe namaḥ || 55 ||
kasya no kurute mugdhe! pipāsākulitaṃ manaḥ |

div.p: prākṛtaṃ tridhā sahajaṃ, lakṣitaṃ ś‍liṣṭaṃ ca | teṣu—
sahajaṃ dvidhā saṃskṛtasamaṃ deś‍yaṃ ca | tayoḥ —

lg.l: sarale! sāhasarāgaṃ parihara rambhoru! muñca saṃrambham |
virasaṃ virahāyāsaṃ vọdhuṃ tava cittamasahaṃ me || 58 ||
vippa api āpu āṇuṇāhaṃ ṣaḍarasamaṃ parihasanteī |

div.p: lakṣitaṃ dvidhā mahārāṣṭraṃ śaurasenaṃ ca | tayoḥ—

lg.l: aṇiśaṃ a pibāmi śoṇidaṃ valiśaśadaṃ śamale huvīadu || 62 ||
aniśaṃ ca pibāmi śoṇitaṃ varṣaśataṃ samaro bhavatu ||)
hiraü haranta ho corahoe bhujidaṃhuhale jappiupaṇavva sacchile viloi aügaṇe |
ehu puṇu piṇaghaṇatthaṇi saṃghaṭṭaü k‍kapaṇu jaṃ candāṇaṇe dijjaï aharaho dantapaṇā/vaṇu ||
(hṛdayaṃ harataś‍caurasyaiṣa eva daṇḍo hale, yat priya eṇaśāvākṣi gṛhītvā lāgito gale |
eṣa punaḥ pīnaghanastane saṃghaṭṭaḥ ko yac‍candrānane dīyate 'dharāya dantavraṇaḥ ||)
puttahomatthajibhu jaḷadahiḍāṃ ujaṃ me pi javi āāsi || 65 ||
ava akhkho ñcī samudrutari siladuhi garukāṇi |
mando hi e pilahi aüa jaṃparuc‍caïte va āṇi || 66 ||
kaṃvali āla e kaṃ te kuducchaladantahi viṭhi suddhi emaṃ ivi ālasīlati |
sava aṃgāpidusarāsahi khavāci duṃ phalinantekī āāsaṇa adasi ||
vala ācchaïṇī jīva upātharusa aṇaï bhavaṇahiṃ vāccharaṃ || 68 ||

div.p: tadetat samastamapi vāk‍yajātamākhyātopādheḥ ekādaśaprakāraṃ viprathate | tadyathā—ekākhyātamanekākhyātamāvṛttākhyātamanuvṛttākhyātaṃ vipariṇatākhyātamekārthākhyātaṃ samuccitākhyātaṃ kṛdabhihitākhyātamapekṣitākhyātamekāntarākhyātaṃ nirantarākhyātamiti | teṣu

lg.l: yadeva rocate mahyaṃ tadeva kurute priyā |
iti vetti na jānāti tat priyaṃ yat karoti sā || 70 ||
tathāpīyamavasthā te na hi sarve bhavādṛśāḥ || 77 ||
tene 'dribandho vavṛdhe payodhistutoṣa rāmo mumude kapīndraḥ |
tatrāsa śatrurdadṛśe suvelaḥ prāpe jalānto jahṛṣuḥ plavaṅgāḥ || 78 ||

div.p:
nanu ca nirantarākhyātaṃ samuc‍citākhyātamekārthākhyātamāvṛttākhyātamityādayo vāk‍yavikalpā nopapadyante; vāk‍yakāro hi manyate nāstyeva tiṅantayossaṃbandhaḥ; tathā ca ‘tiṅṅatiḍaḥ' (8.1.28) ityatra ‘atiṅvacanamanarthaka samānavāk‍yādhikārād’ {8.1. 28(1)} ityatiṅvacanaṃ pratyācaṣṭe | na hyekatra vāk‍ye dve tiṅante sta iti | evaṃ vāk‍yalakṣaṇaṃ karoti— ākhyātaṃ sāvyayakārakaviśeṣaṇaṃ vāk‍yam | tatrākhyātagrahaṇaṃ na kartavyam; na hyavyayakārakaviśeṣaṇapadāni nibandhanamantareṇāvatiṣṭhante | ākhyātamevaiṣāṃ nibandhanamiti labdhe, vyākhyāne punarākhyātagrahaṇaṃ āśritasaṅkhyākhyātapadaparigrahartham,
yatraikamākhyātapadamavyayakārakaviśeṣaṇapadāni sannipan‍ti, tad‌vāk‍yaṃ yathā syāt | anekākhyātapadaprayoge tu vāk‍yasaṃjñā mā bhūdityanāśritasaṅkhyātapadāśaṅkānirāsārtham ‘ekatiṅ vāk‍yam’ iti vacanāntaramārabhate |

tatredaṃ vicāryate— kimekāsmin vāk‍ye dvayostiṅantayossaṃbandha eva nāsti, uta satyapi saṃbandhe dvitīyaṃ na prayujyate ekatiṅ vāk‍yamiti pūrvācāryasamayādanu kiñcidāha—satyapi tiṅantayossaṃbandhe tiṅantāmantritanighātayuṣmadasmadādeśaplutādikāryavyavasthārthamekatiṅvāk‍yamiti pāribhāṣikameva vāk‍yalakṣaṇaṃ kriyate |

samānavāk‍yārthāt padāduttarayostiṅāmantritayornighātassmaryate | yuṣmadasmadoḥ vāṃnāvādaya (8.1.20) ādeśā vidhīyante | ‘vākyasya ṭeḥ pluta udāttaḥ’ (8.2.82) iti vāk‍yācāmantyasya plutaśśiṣyate iti | tac‍ca tadopapadyate yadaikatiṅvāk‍yamiti pāribhāṣikaṃ vāk‍yalakṣaṇaṃ kriyate | anyathā ‘samarthaḥ padavidhiḥ’ (2.1.1) iti padānāṃ parasparāsāmarthye vāk‍yasya cāparisamāptau sarvathā na prāp‍noti | tathā hi ‘nadyāstiṣṭhanti kūle, vṛkṣasya lambate śākhāyāṃ, kaḥ priye mayi kopaḥ ? kā subhaga priyā te ?śālīnāṃ te odanaṃ dāsyāmīti me mātā bravīti, āgaccha bho devadatta kugrāmaṃ gacchāvaḥ, grāmaṃ yadi yāsi re māmapi pratīkṣasva |’ atra tiṣṭhatinā kūlamabhisaṃbandhāt, nadīḥ lambanena śākhā, na vṛkṣaḥ; ka ityanena kopo, na priyā; ketyanena tu priyā, na subhagaḥ; te iti yuṣmadarthena odanaṃ, na śālayaḥ; me ityasmadarthena mātā, na vacanam; āgaccha devadatta, grāmaṃ yadi yāsi re, ityetāvati vāk‍yayoraparisamāp‍tiḥ, kiṃ tarhi ? gacchāvo, māmapi pratīkṣasveti | tataś‍ca nighātādikāryāṇāmaprāp‍tiḥ | ekatiṅparasya tu padasamudāyasya vāk‍yatve paramparayā yathākathañcidabhisaṃbandhe nighātayuṣmadasmadādeśā yujyante | ‘yuktayukte copasaṅkhyānam’ iti yuktena vaktavyaṃ bhavati | evaṃ sākāṅkṣasyāpi padakadambakasya ekatiṅavacchedena vāk‍yatvapratītau ‘vāk‍yasya ṭeḥ p‍luta’ iti vāk‍yācāmantyasyodāttaḥ p‍luta iti siddho bhavati |

kaś‍cittu brūte—nāstyeva tiṅantayossaṃbandhaḥ | sa hi tiṅanteṣūpakalpyamānaḥ ṣọdhaivāvakalpate—viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyasambandhaḥ, sādhyasādhanasambandhaḥ, lakṣyalakṣaṇasambandhaḥ, hetuhetumatsasambandhaḥ, avadhyavadhimatsambandhaḥ, samuc‍cayādisambandhaś‍ceti | tatra viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyasaṃbandhassāmānādhikaraṇyena vā syāt vaiyadhikaraṇyena vā | na tāvat sāmānadhi-
karaṇyena, pacati paṭhatītyetayoratyantamarthabhedāta; na hi padārthayorantyantabhede 'bhede vā viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāva upapadyate | na hi bhavati āmraś‍cūto 'ś‍vattha iti, yatra tu nātyantabhedo abhedo vā tatropapadyate, yathā nīlamutpalamiti |

nanu yathā prapacati stokaṃ pacati ityādāvupasargeṇa stokādinā vā ' 'khyātāṃ viśeṣyate, tathā ' 'khyātāntareṇāpi kasmānna viśeṣyate ? naivam; atra yathā nīlavīraśabdau nīlatvavīratve viśeṣaṇarūpeṇābhidadhatau utpalaṃ puruṣaṃ ca sāmānyenopagṛh‍ṇītaḥ | na tūtpalapuruṣasāmānyayorvā niyatau bhavataḥ, utpalapuruṣaśabdāvapyutpalapuruṣau viśeṣyarūpeṇābhidadhatau nīlatvaṃ vīratvaṃ ca sāmānyenopagṛh‍ṇītaḥ; na tu tatsāmānyayostadviśeṣaṇayorvātmānaṃ niyamayataḥ | parasparopaś‍leṣakṛtayorviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvo bhavati | na vaitat pacati paṭhatītyetayorupapadyate; na hi nīlotpalādivat pacati; paṭhatiṃ, pacatiṃ vā paṭhatirupagrahītuṃ śak‍noti |

nanu cātyantamabhinnārthabhinnārthayoś‍ca dṛś‍yate viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvaḥ | abhinnārthayoryathā adhīte, adhyeti | bhinnārthayoryathā pratiṣṭhate, prasmarati | naivam, adhīte, adhyetītyetayoryadyapi dhāturupasargaṃ na vyabhicarati, vyabhicaratyevopasargo dhātum, ataśśak‍yate 'nvayavyatirekābhyāmarthabhedaḥ kalpayituṃ, yadartho 'yamadhiranyatra dṛṣṭastadartha ihāpi bhavitumarhati | ayaṃ cādhiranyatroparibhāvārtho dṛṣṭaḥ, yathā adhyāste, adhirohatīti; te manyāmahe asya sa evārtha iti | tasmādadhīḍeva śabdakriyo jñānakriyaś‍ceti, adhiśabdastvetamevārthamuparibhāvena viśinaṣṭi | viśiṣṭārthavatāṃ śabdānāṃ vidhipūrvaṃ vā śabdānāṃ tathādhītārthaviṣayametadvijñānamiti etāvānevārtho 'dhinā vibhajyate | iha tarhi kathaṃ pratiṣṭhate, prasmarati iti | na hyatra satyapi kevalaprayoge tiṣṭhateḥ smaratervā pacativatsāmānyābhidhāyitvam | kiṃ tarhi ? virodhinyeva kriyā gamyate vrajikriyā smaraṇanivṛttiś‍ca | vyaktaṃ ca pratiṣṭhata ityanena sthānaprārambho nocyate; kiṃ tarhi ?gamanameva; prasmaratītyanenāpi smaraṇārambho nocyate, api tu smaraṇāṃnārambha eveti |

naiṣa doṣaḥ | praśabdo 'yaṃ prapacatītyādiṣu ādikarmavacanatvena nirjñātaḥ; asya viśeṣatodṛṣṭādanumānādikarmavacanatvamanumīyate | tiṣṭhatiś‍ca devadattastiṣṭhatītyādau kriyāvacanāddhātutvena nirjñātaḥ; ato 'sya sāmānyatodṛṣṭādanumānādgamanārthatvamapi vijñāyate | bahvarthā api dhātavo bhavanti, vapiḥ prakiraṇe dṛṣṭaśchedane 'pi pravartate keśānvapatīti | īḍatiś‍ca | īḍatiś‍ca stutau dṛṣṭaḥ preraṇe 'pi pravartate, agvirvā ito varṣamīṭṭe; karotirapūrvaprādurbhāve dṛṣṭo nirmalakaraṇe 'pi vartate; pādau kuru, ṣaṣṭhaṃ pṛṣṭhaṃ kuru, unmṛdāneti gamyate | tathā kaṭe kuru,
aś‍mānamitaḥ kuru, nikṣipāvākṣipeti gamyate | ayamapi ca dhātutvādanekārtho bhavitumarhati | etena smaratirapi vyākhyātaḥ | na caitanna dṛṣṭaṃ viruddhārthāvarthau tulyarūpeṇa śabdenābhidhīyete | tadyathā— sannikarṣaviprakarṣayordṛṣṭamārācchabdenābhidhānam— ‘ārācchatrumapabādhasva dūram’ (ṛve. 10. 42.7) ‘dūrāddavīyo apasedha śatrūn’ (ṛve. 6. 47. 29) | atastiṣṭhatireva gamanārthaḥ, smaratireva smaraṇānivṛttikriyaḥ; tadviśeṣaś‍copasarga iti yuktamuktaṃ vastunoratyantabhede 'bhede vā viśeṣaṇāviśeṣyabhāva iti | yadāha—“sambhave vyabhicāre ca viśeṣaṇamarthavadbhavati” iti |

nāpi vaiyadhikaraṇ‍yenākhyātamākhyātasya viśeṣaṇaṃ bhavati, prādhānye 'sati asattvabhūtārthatvāt | iha rājñaḥ puruṣa iti bharaṇādikriyānimitto vyatireko viśeṣasambandhanam | na ca prādhānyasyaiva rājārthasyopajāyate; na ca tathākhyātārthasya prādhānyaṃ sattvābhāve vā sambhavati | yatrāpi ca kriyāpadaṃ śrūyate mātuḥ smarati sarpiṣo jānīte iti tatrāpi sā kriyā sādhyāsyetyanena rūpeṇāśrīyamāṇasattvabhūtasyāpradhānasya mātrāderarthasya vyatireka upajāyate; śrūyamāṇakriyāviśeṣasambandhanimittaṃ bhavati | na caitadākhyātasyopapadyate, sattvabhūtatvādeva nimittānirdeś‍yatayāsyeti vyapadeśābhāvāt | yatkhalu pariniṣṭhitasvabhāvamasya tasyeti sarvanāmapratyavamarśayogyaṃ tadviśeṣaṇatayā k‍vacidupayujyate vā na vā ? yatpunarātmanaivā 'parisamāptarūpe tadviparītaṃ, tatkathamivānyasya viśeṣaṇatvaṃ yāyāt ?

nanvidānīmeva prapacati, stokaṃ pacatītyasattvabhūtayoḥ praśabdastokaśabdayorviśeṣaṇatvamuktam | naivam; anyathā tadupapatteḥ, upasargāṇāṃ kriyāviśeṣaṇānāṃ vā sattvabhūtānāmapyananyaviṣayatvenaiva kriyāṃ prati guṇabhāvo bhavati | tathā hi—yo 'sau kriyābhūto dharmaḥ prārambhādiḥ; taṃ kriyārthamiva kriyānupraviṣṭamasatvabhaūtamabhidadhat praśabdo 'bhivyañjayati | yadi vā yathākṣinikocādayo 'bhidadhata evārthān pradarśayanti, evaṃ kriyāsthān, prārambhādīnanabhidadhata eva prādayo 'vadyotayanti | dṛś‍yate anadhīyamānasyāpyarthasyātmasthasyāvadyotanaṃ, yathā dāṇḍā krīḍeti; ‘tadasyāṃ praharaṇamiti krīḍāyāṃ ṇo’ (4.2. 57) vihitaḥ krīḍāmabruvan praharaṇatvaṃ daṇḍatvamavadyotayati | tasmāt prapacatītyatra pacimeva saṃdigdhaṃ viśeṣa eva sthāpayannasattvārtho 'pi praśabdo viśeṣaṇatvaṃ labhate | evaṃ stokaśabdo 'pi kriyābhūtaṃ dharmapakarṣādikaṃ kriyārthamiva asattvabhūtaṃ kriyānupraviṣṭamabhidadhānaḥ kriyānurodhādevāsattvabhāvamāpannaḥ kriyāviśeṣaṇatvaṃ bhajate |

na caivamākhyātāntarasthaṃ viśeṣaṇamākhyātamabhivyañjayitumabhidhātuṃ vā śaknoti, dvayorapi prādhānyena parasparānapekṣatvāt | bhavatu copasargāderasattvārthasyāpi nīlotpalādivadeva sāmānādhikaraṇyena viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvaḥ; vaiyadhikaraṇye tu vyatirekāpekṣāyāṃ kathamivaitadbhavati ? na hi aparinippannatvenātmalābha eva kṣīṇasyāparopakāriṇaḥ karaṇādayo vyatirekā yujyante | ato vaiyadhikaraṇyenāpi na tiṅantayorviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvassambandho bhavati | sādhyasādhanabhāvo 'pi nopapadyate, sa hi kriyayoḥ kartṛtve karmatve vā syāt; sādhyaṃ hi vastūtpadyamānatvena kartā karma ceti | na caitadubhayamapi kriyāyāḥ kriyāntaraṃ prati yujyate | tiṅantena hi kriyātmotpattiṃ prati prayatamānakārakākāṅkṣāpi prakṛtyā prayogeṣu viniveśitasvarūpā 'bhidhīyate | ato 'pratibdhātmarūpatvena kriyāyāssādhanaparavaśatvena tadavaruddhatvāditareṇa kriyātmanā sambandhasattvenāsyāḥ kartṛrūpatā karmarūpatā vā sambhavati, yataḥ pariniṣpannarūpasyātmalābhanirapekṣasya siddhātmanassādhanābhāvo ghaṭate, na tūktaviparītātmana iti | kriyāyāś‍cāyameva svabhāvaḥ, yaduta sādhanādhīnatvena sādhyasvabhāvāyāḥ pratītiḥ | yā ca sādhyasvabhāvā sā kathamivānyasmin sādhye sādhanabhāvaṃ gacchet, yena kartrītyucyate ? yā ca sādhanādhīnatvena sādhyasvabhāvā sā kathamiva kriyā sādhyeta, yena karmetyucyate ? yadi ca syāt pariniṣpannarūpadravyavadevedaṃtayā nirdiśyeta | na ca nirdiśyate, ato 'nidantayā nirdeśādapi na sādhanam | avasthārūpaś‍ca sādhanadharmo vyāpāraśabdavācyaḥ kriyā | sā kathamivātmasiddhaye tathābivadhameva dharmāntaramapekṣeta ? anapekṣitayoś‍ca kathamiva mithassambandhopapattiḥ ?

na ca kriyāyāḥ kimapi tadavaśiṣyate yatsādhanairasādhitaṃ kriyāntarasya sādhyaṃ bhaviṣyati | tadevamitaretarānāyattarūpayorasambandha eva kriyayoḥ | na ca nirvartamānalabdhātmakaṃ vastu nirvartakādṛte pareṇa saha sambandhamarhet | upakāryopakārakanibandhanasvabhāvānāmitaretareṇa saṃbandhalabdhātmakasya copakārakatvam | kriyā ca tathārūpatvavirahāt sādhanebhyassvotpattimavekṣamāṇā kathamivātathābhūtakriyāntareṇa saṃbandhamiyāt ? tasmāt svasādhanāvaruddhatvāt sādhyamānaikasvabhāvāyāḥ kriyāyāḥ kartṛtve karmatve vā na kriyāntareṇa saha saṃbandhaḥ |

nanu ca yathā pākaṃ karoti, pāko vartate iti tiṅkṛdabhihitayoḥ kriyayossādhyasādhanabhāvo dṛśyate, tathā ca paṭhati pacatītyetayorapi kasmānna bhavati ? naivam; uktamidaṃ bhāṣye, ‘asti khalu tiṅabhihitasya kṛdabhihitasya bhāvasya viśeṣaḥ,
kṛdabhihito hi bhāvo dravyavat prakāśamānaḥ kriyayā samavāyaṃ gacchati’ iti | na hi bhavati pacati paṭhati iti lakṣyalakṣaṇabhāvo 'pyākhyātābhihitayoḥ kriyayorabhinnasādhanayorvā saṃbhavati | dvidhāpi cānupapattiḥ; sādhyamānatvena pravartamānasya sādhanaparatantrasya cātmano 'nidantānirdeśasya sādhanavallakṣaṇatvāyogāt | nanu ca mā bhūt kriyāyāssādhanam; lakṣaṇaṃ tūbhayathāpi dṛśyate, pācakaḥ paṭhati, rudataḥ prāvrājīditi | tato yaḥ pacati sa paṭhati, sa roditi, ayaṃ pravrajatītyākhyātayorlakṣyalakṣaṇabhāvo bhaviṣyati | ciraṃ jīva, tvayaiva smārito 'smi | ākhyātayorlakṣyalakṣaṇatvenāsambandhakāraṇasya yadatra ‘lakṣaṇahetvoḥ kriyāyāḥ’ (3.2.126) iti śatṛśānacau tiṅapavādau smaryete | ato lakṣaṇatve kriyāyāḥ kriyāntaraṃ prati samāśrīyamāṇe pacan paṭhati, rudataḥ prāvrājīdityeva bhavitavyam |

nanu yaḥ pacati sa paṭhati, sa rodityayaṃ pravrajatīti tatkathaṃ sambandhaḥ? etena hetuhetumadbhāvaḥ ākhyātayoḥ pratyukto bhavati, yato 'sāvapi dvidhā— heturvā hetumatparatvena, hetumato vā hetuparatvena | tatra hetorhetumatparatve śatṛśānajbhyāṃ hetumatassvahetuparatve tumunādibhirbhāvyam | yathā pacan bhuṅkte, adhīyamāno vasati, bhoktuṃ pacati, bhojako vrajatīti | nanu pacati, bhuṅkte, vrajatīti tat kasya kena saṃbandhaḥ ? avadhyavadhimadbhāvo 'pi tiṅntayornāstyeva | sa hi deśataḥ kālato vā syāt | na tāvaddeśataḥ, tasya mūrtimadviṣayatvāt | kālatastu yujyate, kiṃtu tatra pūrvakāle ktvāpratyayavidhānāt paktvā bhuṅkta ityeva syāt, na tu pacati bhuṅkta iti | samuccayenāpi kriyāyāssaṃbandhaḥ | so 'pi hi dvidhaiva; sādhanānāṃ vā kriyāyāṃ yathā gauraśvaś‍ca gṛhyatām; kriyāṇāṃ vā sādhane yathā asau pacati paṭhati ceti; na tu kriyāṇāṃ kriyāyāmeva |

nanu caikatvāt kriyāyā yadyapi sādhanasamuccaye kriyābhisaṃbandho nāsti, tathāpyekavastuviṣayatvena kriyāsamuccaye 'sau bhaviṣyati | tathā hi— ya eva pacati sa eva paṭhatītyaikādhikaraṇye bhavatyeva sambandhopapattiḥ | naivaṃ sādhyayossādhanāyattayoralabdhātmanossādhanonmukhatvena parivartamānayoḥ, kriyāyāḥ parasparānapekṣatvāt; na hyananvitātmanāmadhikaraṇamapekṣāmupajanayitumalam | atassavyetaragoviṣāṇavat paraspareṇāsamanvitameva kriyādvayaṃ sādhane samuccīyateṃ na ca samuccīyamāne vastunī mithassaṃbadhyete, tathā sati samāhāretaretarayoranyatarāpattau samuccayasyaivābhāvāt | ādigrahaṇādanvācaye 'pyananvaya eva kriyayoḥ | tasmānnāstyevākhyātayormithassaṃbandha iti |

nanu ca asti sa me rocate, asti tvamīśiṣe, nāhaṃ rame 'smi iti sāmānādhikaraṇyena viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvaḥ; bhavati pacati, bhavati pakṣyati, bhavatyapākṣīt, bhavedapi bhavet, syādapi syāditi kartṛtvena; paś‍ya mṛgo dhāvati, iha paś‍yāmaḥ karmaṇi dvinacanabahuvacanānyudāhriyante, ehi manye rathena yāsyasi, smarasi devadatta kaś‍mīreṣu vatsyāmastatraudanaṃ bhokṣyāmahe, na marṣayāmi yattatra bhavān vṛṣalaṃ yājayediti karmatvena sādhyasādhanabhāvaḥ; yo bhuṅkte sa gṛhyatām, yo 'dhīte sa pacatītyabhinnasādhanatvena; sa svapiti eṣa budhyate, sa udeti ayamastametīti bhinnasādhanatvena lakṣyalakṣaṇabhāvaḥ; hantīti palāyate, varṣatīti dhāvatīti hetorhetumatparatvena; vakṣyāmīti vrajati, bhokṣyate ityāsta iti hetuhetumatorhetuparatvena hetuhetumadbhāvaḥ; yāvadbhuṅkte tato vrajati, yadayaṃ bhuṅkte tataḥ paṭhati, yadayaṃ bhuk‍tvā vrajatītyadhīta eva tataḥ paramiti avadhyavadhimadbhāvaḥ; sak‍tūn piba, dhānāḥ khāda, odanaṃ bhuṅkṣvetyevāyamabhyavaharati, pacati cāyaṃ paṭhati ceti samuccayaḥ; vaṭo! | bhikṣāmaṭa gāṃ cānayetvanvācayo 'pi tiṅanteṣu dṛś‍yate | tatkathamucyate nākhyātayossaṃbandho 'stīti?

naivam; vāk‍yabhedādinā tadupapatteḥ | asti sa sa me rocate, asi tvaṃ tvamīśiṣe, asmyahamahaṃ rame, astyetad gacchāmo vayaṃ, bhavatvevametat payasodhayāmayatvamamithyevāsi (?), yanmurajitaṃ tvamapūpuja ityukteṣu vāk‍yabhedā upapadyante | nipātā vā astyādayaḥ ākhyātasarūpā nirarthakā api vāk‍yapūraṇāya kamīmidvādivatprayujyante; na tu kriyābhirviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvamanubhavanti | bhavati pacatītyādiṣu tu pacatīti pakṣyatīti apakṣīditi ca yo 'rtho bhavati asāvastītyarthaḥ | nanu pacatyāderbhavatau kartṛtvena sādhyasādhanabhāvaḥ; evaṃ bhavedapi bhavet, syādapi syāditi |

nanu cāvaś‍yameva pacatyādikriyā bhavatikriyākartṛtvenābhyupeyā | yadi hyeṣā na bhavettena kartrī syāt siddharūpatayā, na lakāreṇābhidhīyate | na ca sā satī siddhabhāvamupaiti | na ca lakāraḥ siddhatadabhidhānena vinā kartṛbhāvenemāṃ pratipādayitumutsahate | tato yenātmanā kartrī na tena kriyā, yena ca sādhyātmanā kriyā na tena kartrīti vastvantarameva lakāreṇa kartṛtayā kathitamāpadyeta | devadattaḥ pacatīti cānena jñātavatprajñāpyate vidheyatā tvasterbhavatītyatra tu ajñātarūpatayopādīyate bhavanakriyānubhavitṛtvāt | na ca yugapadeva jñātavadajñātavacca samāśrayaṇaṃ yuktam; ato na kriyā kartṛtvamupayāti | paś‍ya mṛgo dhāvatītyatra tu paś‍yaśabdo na tiṅantaḥ | kiṃ tarhi nipāto 'yamāś‍caryamityesminnarthe vartate; paś‍ya bhuṅkte, aho āś‍caryamadbhutaṃ bhuṅkta ityarthaḥ |

athavā paś‍ya mṛgo dhāvatītyatra nāsāvevamāha—dṛśaṃ mṛgasaraṇe niyuṅkṣva; kiṃ tarhi ? cakṣuḥ praṇidhatsva pramatto mā bhūriti; yato 'praṇihitacakṣussan mṛgasaraṇamanyadvā pratipadyate | yathā rūpamagryaṃ dṛṣṭvā etadevāha—ālokaya ālokayeti, tasmātpaś‍yetyetāvati vāk‍yasya parisamāptatvānnāsti dṛśassaraṇena saṃbandhaḥ |

athavā yo dhāvati mṛgastaṃ paśryeti sarvanāmnā yadā so 'rthaḥ pratyavamṛṣṭo bhavati tadā kriyā tasyopalakṣaṇāya pravartate | yo dhāvati sartāraṃ taṃ paśryati; ayaṃ cārthaḥ paśrya dhāvatīti padayorasaṃbandhatvena śrutārthāpattigamyaḥ na tu śabdasanniveśī |
yadi vā śrutārthāpattyeva gamyamānetiśabdopasaṃhṛtasya mṛgo dhāvatīti vāk‍yārthasya dṛśau karmatvameva | paśryāma udāhriyanta iti |

athavā dve ete vāk‍ye—ekametāvati vāk‍yam ‘iha paśryāmaḥ’ karmaṇi dvivacanabahuvacanādīni vacanānyeva dṛśaḥ karmatvenāvatiṣṭhante, nodāhṛtiḥ | ataś‍ca paśryāmo yasmādudāhriyante prayujyanta iti dvitīyam | ehi manye rathena yāsyasītyatra ‘prahāse ca manyopapade manyateruttama ekavacca’ (1.4.106) iti vacanād yadāyamarthaḥ ehi manyase rathena yāsyāmīti | yadā vā sūtrapratiṣedhapakṣe svaviṣaya eva madhyamottamau tadā sarvathā gamyamānetiśabdopasaṃhṛtasya vāk‍yārthasyaiva karmatvam | ehīti ca prahāsaviṣayasaṃbodhanārtha ākhyātasvarūpo nipātaḥ | ākhyāṃtasvarūpāś‍ca puruṣaṃ saṃkhyāṃ na vyabhicaranti; na hi bhavati tvamasti vayamastīti | kiñcāstirapi nipātaḥ; so 'yaṃ yathā astikṣīrā gauḥ; tatra hyākhyātamiti kṛtvoktaḥ; subadhikāre 'stikṣīrādivacanamiti; na cāvyayatvāt; nipāto 'yamiti parihāraḥ |

nanu ca saṅkhyāmavyabhicaran kathamekaśabdo bahūnāṃ prahāse bahutvaṃ brūyāt ? naivam; bahubhirekaḥ prahasyate, naikena bahavaḥ, na hi bahuṣvekaṃ prahasatsu sūtrapratiṣedhapakṣe ‘ehi manye rathena yāsyāmi’ (iti) | yadā vā sūtrapratiṣedhapakṣe astīti kathaṃ na sattvabhūto 'rthassādhyasādhanasaṃbandhamanubhavati ? yo bhuṅkte sa gṛhyatāmityatrāpi vāk‍yadvitayameva | na cātra kriyayoḥ lakṣyalakṣaṇabhāvaḥ; kriyāyāḥ kārakopalakṣaṇatvāt | tathā hi yo bhuṅkte sa devadatta iti devadattasattvopalakṣaṇameko vāk‍yārthaḥ; sa tathābhūto gṛhyatāmiti tasya grahaṇasaṃbandhaḥ |

darśanamaparam— na ca yathā sattvaṃ tadrūpābhidhāyitvena smaraṇāt kartṛprādhānyamabhidadhat kriyāyāḥ kriyāntaraṃ prati lakṣaṇatvamabhidhatte, tathā sarvanāmābhidhātuṃ śaknoti | tena hi sā
kriyā sādhyatvātpracyāvya sādhanopasarjanabhāvamupanītā tatparāmṛṣṭaṃ devadattamupalakṣayati; sa tu tathābhūtaḥ kriyāntareṇa saṃbadhyata iti | na hyekasyāḥ pravṛttessādhanopalakṣaṇamaparakriyāsaṃbandhaś‍copapanno bhavati |

nanvidamevāsyāḥ kriyāntareṇānvitatvaṃ yadanyasyāssādhanamupalakṣyati | naivam, eṣā svasādhanalakṣaṇatvena pravartamānā yadadhīnodayā tadevopalakṣayet, nānyad, asaṃbandhāt | nanu cāsyā api devadatta eva sādhanaṃ, sa cānayopalakṣitaḥ, tatkathaṃ bhinnavāk‍yatā ? naivam; bhavatu nāma devadattopalakṣaṇatvamasyāḥ; kiṃtu na taṃ devadattatayopalakṣayati, api tu svasādhanatvena | tatassvasādhana eva devadatte prathamato 'syā viśrāntiḥ, devadattasya ca tayaiva tadābhisaṃbandho 'bhyupeyaḥ | na hi yaugapadyena lakṣyamāṇatvaṃ prādhānyaṃ ca pratipadyeta, kriyāntare guṇabhāvaṃ ca, virodhaprasaṅgat | na ca bhujikriyāvacchinnasyetarakriyābhisaṃbandho 'bhimataḥ, samuccīyamānakriyādvayaprasaṅgat | yo bhuṅkte sa gṛhyatāmityekarasā pravṛttiḥ, pratyāsatteḥ | tanmātramidaṃ sūtraṃ, tasya tu punaritthaṃbhūta evārtha iti na tatra vāk‍yabhedaḥ | etena yo 'dhīte sa pacatītyapi pratyuktam | sa svapityeṣa budhyate, sa udetyayamastametītyatra tu sādhanatvānnatarāṃ lakṣyalakṣaṇabhāvaḥ | hastīti palāyata iti— atra tvitiśabdo hetuhetumadbhāvaṃ dyotayannarthasya svātantryaṃ karoti | dṛṣṭa itiśabdo 'rthasya svātantryamupajanayan, ‘tasminniti nirdiṣṭe pūrvasya’ (1.1.66) iti | atra hi tasminnityadhikaraṇasya kartṛkarmasamavāyinyau kriye prati upādhitvena pravartamānasyākāṅkṣā; yata ādheyastatra sve ātmanyavasthānābhāvāditiśabdenāsatyavacchede kāryayogo na syāt | ‘tasminniti nirdiṣṭe pūrvasya’ ityukte tasmin ya ādheyo nirdiṣṭa iti saṃpratyayaḥ syāt; tasmāt saptamyarthanirdeśe pūrvasya kāryasya saṃpratyayārthamitiśabda upādīyate | evamihāpi | itiśabdo vā na tasya svātantryamupajanayati ! yasmādayaṃ (hastī) hanti tasmādayaṃ palāyata iti | evaṃ varṣatītyādāvapi yojanīyam | atra ca tiṅantayoritiśabdasāmarthyāddhetuhetumadbhāvo 'numīyate, na punaśrśabdasanniveśīti | yāvadbhuṅkte tato vrajatītyādau tu bhinnavāk‍yatāyāmapi yāvattataḥ pūrvamityādinipātasāmarthyādavadhyavadhimadbhāvo gamyate; na punarākhyātaśabdasanniveśīti | saktūn pibetyādāvapi ‘saktūn piba’, ‘dhānāḥ khāda’, ‘odanaṃ bhuṅkṣva’ iti viśeṣaṇavākyārthā itiśabdopasaṃhṛtā itiśabdasāmarthyādeva tatsāmānyābhidhāyinā ayamabhyavaharatīti vāk‍yāntareṇocyante | pacati cāyaṃ paṭhati ceti vāk‍yadvayameva; evaṃ vaṭo ! bhikṣāmaṭa, gāṃ cānayeti |

tadevaṃ kātyāyanamate nāstyevākhyātayossaṃbandhaḥ; sūtrakārasya tu mate 'styevākhyātayoḥ anekavāk‍yatvenābhisaṃbandha iti, yadayaṃ samānavāk‍yādhikāre 'tiṅntāduttarasya tiṅo nighātaṃ śāsti | ‘abhijñāvacane lṛṭ’ (3.2.112) iti smṛtyuktāvatītakāle 'pi lṛṭaṃ smarati; yaditi (3.2.113) yatprayoge tanniṣedhati, ‘vibhāṣā sākāṅkṣe’ (3.2.114) ityākāṅkṣāyāṃ vibhāṣayābhyanujānāti, ‘na yadyanākāṅkṣe’ (3.4.23) iti nirākāṅkṣavāk‍ye k‍tvā-ṇamulau niṣidhya laḍādīnevānumanyate iti kā punaratropapattiḥ? ucyate ākhyātapadatulyadharmiṇo hi k‍tvāntasyānekasyāpi dṛṣṭastiṅantena saha saṃbandhaḥ | s‍nātvā pītvā bhuk‍tvā vrajatīti; tathā pūrvaṃ s‍nāti bhuṅkte pibati tato vrajati iti | tatra yathaiva k‍tvāntasya tiṅantenaikavāk‍yatvaṃ tathā pūrvakālakriyābhidhāyināmākhyātānāṃ sarveṣāmapi kriyāviśeṣaṇakatvādbhavati | uktaṃ ca—

kiṃca yathākathaṃcidāśrīyamāṇo 'rthassāmānādhikaraṇyenāvadhibhāvena vā viśeṣaṇatvaṃ na vyatikrāmati | tathā hi, vraja devadattetyāmantritasya viśeṣaṇatvenaikavāk‍yatvād ‘āmantritasya ca’ (8.7.19) iti nighāto dṛś‍yate; kartṛtvādbhaviṣyatīti ced vrajāni devadattetyatra katham? na hi devadatto vrajikriyāyāḥ kartā, na khalvapi kārakasya viśeṣakam, nāpi suṣṭhu pacatīti padāntaratvena kriyāviśeṣaṇamupapadyate | kiṃtu kriyāṃ prati ābhimukhyenāvasthāpyamānaḥ pañca vārān pacatītivat bāhyaviśeṣaṇatāṃ labhate | kaḥ punarbāhyāntarayoḥ kriyāviśeṣaṇayoviṃśeṣaḥ ? ayamasti āntaraṃ hi kriyāviśeṣaṇaṃ karmatvaṃ napuṃsakatvaṃ ca pratilabhate; bāhyasya tu svaliṅgatā na karmatvaniyamaḥ | evaṃ ca kṛtvoktam—

nanu ca saṃbodhanapadasya tiṅntenaikavāk‍yatā yujyate, saṃbodhanaṃ hyākṣiptakriyāpadaṃ vartate | devadatta abhimukho bhavetyābhimukhye hi yujyate | tatra devadattetyetāvatyarthasya parisamāptatvāt saṃbodhanapadamekaṃ vāk‍yam, so 'bhimukhībhūtaḥ kriyāntare niyujyate; vrajeti tadākhyātameva dvitīyam; ‘devadatta! vrajāni’ ityatra tu kriyāntaraniyogo 'pi nāstīti
bhinnavāk‍yatvameva | tanna, vāk‍yalakṣaṇāyogāt | evaṃ hyāhuḥ—

evaṃ ca bruvato yathoktalakṣaṇapadasamūho vāk‍yamityabhiprāyaḥ, na ca devadatteti padasamūhaḥ; athābhimukho bhavetyākṣepādasya samūhabhāvaḥ; tathāpi sākāṅkṣatvādavāk‍yatvam | na hyabhimukhībhāvamātrameva kaś‍cid vidhatte | kiṃ tarhyabhimukhībhāvaṃ vidhāya kriyāntare niyuṅkte | api cābhimukho bhavetyadhyāhriyamāṇayāpi kriyayā saṃbandhaṃ manyase vrajetyupāttayāpi na manyasa ityaho mādhyasthyam | kiṃcābhimukho bhavetyayamapi niyogaḥ, tatrānabhimukhasya niyoktumaśakyatvāt | abhimukhīkaraṇāya kriyāntarādhyāhāre 'navasthā, tadbhayāccābhimukhīkāragarbhaniyogo 'ṅgīkartavyaḥ, sa ca vrajetyādāvapi tulya evetyalamatiprasaṅgena | yadi cāmancitasya tiṅantenaikavāk‍yatā na syāt, ‘āmantritaṃ pūrvamavidyamānavad’ iti (8.1.72) sūtrakāro na brūyāt | tatredamavidyamānavattve prayojanam nighātādayo mā bhūvanniti; nighātādayaś‍cāsamānavāk‍yatvādeva na bhaviṣyanti, kimavidyamānavadbhāvena |

na caitad vārttikakāro manyate | so 'pi hyavidyamānavadbhāvasya prayojanāni paṭhati avidyamānavattve prayojanamāmantritayuṣmadasmadādeśatiṅ‍‌nighātā iti | bhavatu nāma sāmānādhikaraṇyena vaiyadhikaraṇyena vā yathākathaṃcidāśrīyamāṇānāmākhyātānāmākhyātaṃ prati viśeṣaṇatvamupalakṣaṇatvaṃ hetumattvamavadhibhāvo vā, samuc‍cayo 'pyevamevopapadyatām; sādhyasādhanabhāvastu nopapadyate, viruddharūpayorarthayorekarūpeṇa śabdenābhidhānāt | yathā 'yaṃ daṇḍo harānena phalānītyayaṃ daṇḍa ityanena rūpeṇa daṇḍaśabdo daṇḍārthamantarbhūtāstikriyāmupādātumīṣṭe | anenetyayaṃ ca śabdaḥ karaṇarūpeṇeva vastusāmānyamabhidadhat pratyakṣeṇopādatte, na rūpāntareṇa, prakaraṇāttu daṇḍe pratipattiḥ | tathehāpi pacati dhāvatītyādirākhyātasādhyabhūtāṃ kriyāmabhidhatte, tāmeva ca siddhāṃ sādhanatvamāpannāmanenaiva rūpeṇa vakṣyatītyasambhavaḥ |

yadevaṃ hi kriyāyāssādhyamānatvamanidantānirdeś‍yaṃ pariniṣṭhitaṃ rūpaṃ tenaiva sādhanabhāvaṃ pratipadyate, na rūpāntareṇa; tasyābhāvāllakāro 'pi caitāṃ sādhyatayā bhavantīṃ kartṛbhāvenābhidhatte pacati bhavatīti |
nanu kimanyadbhavanaṃ pacatikriyāyāssādhyatāvyatireki, kiṃ vā tadatiriktaṃ kartṛtvaṃ, yena sādhyasādhanabhāvo 'vakalpeta ?

ucyate— yo 'yamasyāḥ kārakasaṃbandhaḥ, kārakavyāpāraviṣayatā na kārakāṇi śaśaviṣāṇavat parākaroti, śak‍yate saṃpādayituṃ tebhyassaṃpattimanubhavati | tadasyāḥ kārakasaṃbandhalakṣaṇaṃ sādhyamānatvameva rūpaṃ bhavanamabhidhīyate | pacatikriyā bhavanaṃ nirvartayantī kārakebhyo nirvṛttiṃ pratipadyate, kārakāṇi vyāpāravanti karotītyarthaḥ | yatpunarasyā viśeṣarūpaṃ yāgādidharmakaṃ paktirūpaṃ pacatyekaśabdavācyamananyasādhāraṇaṃ, tenaiṣā kartrī saṃpadyate, tadevamananyasādhāraṇena svabhāvena kartrī saṃpadya sādhyātmanā bhavatikriyārūpatvena bhavatiḥ pacati, bhavatisādhyatvaṃ labhata ityarthaḥ | athavā prayogātmako yo 'dhiśrayaṇādivyāpārastaireṣā bhavanakriyārūpatāmupayāti | phalabhūtena viklittyātmanā bhavitṛrūpaṃ kartṛtvaṃ, tena bhavati pacati ityayamarthaḥ paktiradhiśrayaṇādyātmanā bhavati, adhiśrayaṇādayo 'syāḥ pravṛttā iti yāvat | adhiśrayaṇādirūpeṇa vā bhavitṛtvaṃ paktirūpeṇa bhavanakriyātvaṃ, tenāyamarthaḥ adhiśrayaṇādayaḥ paktirūpatayā bhavanti; viklittissañjāteti yāvat | athavā śabdavācyaṃ buddhiparigataṃ yadrūpaṃ tena kartṛtvamasyāṃ, bāhyasaṃpaktirūpatvena bhavanarūpatvaṃ, bāhyarūpeṇa bhavitṛtvaṃ, buddhyātmanā bhavanarūpatvamiti | yadi vā sāmānyātmanā kartṛtvaṃ viśeṣātmanā bhavanarūpatetyupapadyate kriyāyāṃ kārakatvam |

nanu coktaṃ na lakāraḥ siddhavadabhidhānena vinā kartṛbhāvenemāṃ pratipādayitumutsahate, tataś‍ca siddhatvenābhidhāne punarapi virodhaḥ | naivam, yadeva pacatikriyāyāssvabhāvabhūtamātmīyarūpaṃ sādhyatālakṣaṇaṃ tenaiva rūpeṇa sā kartṛtvamupagatā lakāreṇocyate | siddhatvāvabhāsaḥ kuta iti cet, lakārastāṃ kartṛbhāvena pratipādayituṃ pravṛttassiddhatvenāvagamayati, na tu sādhyāyāḥ kriyāyāḥ siddhatvāpattiḥ | ato rūpāntarāpatteḥ nāsti virodhaḥ | yathā corasya rujatīti dhātvartha eva rogalakṣaṇaḥ kartrantarāśrayaṇāt kartṛbhāvamupayāti; sādhyātmana eva cāsya kartṛtvam | na ca siddhatāprāptiḥ kartṛtvena pratīyamānā siddhatayā 'vabhāsate; tathā kriyāpi na siddhatayā lakāreṇābhidhīyate | api tu sādhyāyāmeva tasyāṃ tadadhikaraṇāt kartṛśabdairabhidhīyate iti | athavā ekasyaiva vastuno nānārūpāśśaktayo viruddhāviruddhasvabhāvā lokayātrāṃ kalpayanti | tato 'sya sarvaśakterbhāvasya vācakaśabdaḥ kaś‍cit siddhātmikāṃ
śaktivṛttimavalambate, kaś‍cit sādhyarūpām | tadevaṃ siddhasādhyatāśaktiyuktaṃ vastu śabdābhyāmabhidhīyamānaṃ na virudhyate, anekaśaktiyuktatvāt | pacatītyanena tadeva sādhyatvenāvagataṃ bhavatīti lakārassādhyatvenābhidhatte | sarvaśaktivirahitaṃ vā vastu, sakalavikalpollekharahitatvāt | tasya tu śabdā eva svamahim‍nā nānāvidhabuddhyupajananahetavaśśaktiṃ saṃniveśayanti; śak‍tyāviṣṭamiva vyavahāragocaratāṃ nayanti | tena śabdābhyāmeva siddhasādhyatāśak‍tyādhānādakhilavikalpīkṛtātmakamapi tadvastu siddhasādhyabhāvenopadiś‍yate | bhavati pacatītyekena śabdena sanniveśitasādhyatāśaktiyuktamabhihitam, itareṇa tu tadeva śak‍tyantarāropeṇa prakāś‍yata iti nāsti virodhaḥ |

yadi vā na padasya padarūpādevādhikārthatā; kiṃ tarhi ? vāk‍yarūpāt | tadyathā puruṣa iti padakāle puruṣo vyatirikta ucyate | yadā tu rājñaḥ puruṣa iti viśeṣasannidhau prayujyate tadā viśiṣṭasya puruṣārthasya gatiḥ, na puruṣasyeti vāk‍yakāle 'dhikasya dharmasya prādurbhāvaḥ, tathā pacatīti naikasmādeva padarūpāt kartṛtvam; yadā bhavatīti padāntarasannidhistadā paratve sādhanamadṛṣṭadavāk‍yakāle puruṣasyaiva vyatireka upajāyata iti | yathāpi vyapadeśivadbhāvenābhinnasyāpi dhātoravayavaprathamaikāj‍vyapadeśa iyāyetyādau pravartate tathā buddhibhedakalpanayā ākhyātavācyasyārthasya bhede 'pi kriyākārakādivyapadeśāḥ pravartante | tataś‍ca pacatītyatrāpi na kācid aparā tadatirekiṇī bhavanakriyā, kaś‍cidaparo vā kartā virodhaheturasti; api tu saiva vyapadeśivadbhāvena bhavanakriyārūpatāṃ pak‍tṛtvaṃ ca darśayantī cakāsti | etena paś‍ya mṛgo dhāvatītyādāvapi siddhasādhyatvayoravirodhaḥ |

api caikasyāpyarthasya viṣayabhedena dvidharmatvaṃ na virudhyate | yathā rājñaḥ puruṣasya puruṣa iti puruṣaśśeṣī bhavati śeṣaś‍ca iti, rājānaṃ prati śeṣo 'vicalitasvārthaśśeṣitāmāpadyate, evaṃ ca dhāvatīti mṛge kartari sādhyabhāvaṃ prādhānyenājahat saraṇaṃ dṛśāvaṅgatvaṃ sādhanatvaṃ copaitīti na kaś‍cid virodhaḥ | athavāyamarthaḥ — sādhanamidamayaṃ sādhya iti rūpaṃ siddhamātrametat, yathā pade ayaṃ prakṛtyartho 'yaṃ pratyayārtha ityeka evāsāvarthaḥ aviśiṣṭo viśiṣṭo vā vāk‍yaviśeṣayorgrahītavyaḥ, yathā muṇḍayati, kūṭayati, mūtrayati, carcayatīti | tatra muṇḍayati māṇavakam; muṇḍiḥ keśacchedanavacanaḥ; tasya tu vyutpattiḥ muṇḍaṃ karotīti sāmānyapravṛttiviśeṣaṃ muṇḍaśabdo 'vasthāpayati; karotiviśeṣo yasmin ṇijutpadyate, na karotimātram | anye punaḥ
keśacchedanādivacanānmuṇḍādīnadhyavasyanti; yathoktam athavā muṇḍādayo dhātavaḥ | muṇḍayatīti caitasminnarthe kūṭayatīti ca prayuñjate, kūṭayati māṇavakamiti | yathā ca muṇḍaṃ karotīti prayuñjate, naivaṃ kūṭaṃ karotīti; kūṭaśabdena hi karotiviśeṣo na lakṣyate; kiṃtu chidādiviśeṣamavalakṣyamāṇoddeśavibhāgaṃ kūṭirevopādatte | evaṃ mūtraṃ karotīti mūtrayati, carcāṃ karotīti carcayati | mūtreṇa carcayā vā karotau viśeṣyamāṇe kṣaraṇaṃ paribhāṣaṇaṃ vā viśeṣeṇopādīyate | sa eva ca kadācit kṣaraṇaviśeṣaḥ paribhāṣaṇaviśeṣo vā naṣṭoddeśavibhāga upādīyate, yathā 'mūtra prasavaṇe' mūtrayati, 'carca paribhāṣaṇe' carcayatīti |

evaṃ paś‍ya mṛgo dhāvatīti idamatra sādhanapadamidamatra sādhyapadamiti utprekṣaiṣā | idaṃ tvartha-satattvaṃ ‘nātra saraṇaṃ, na darśanaṃ na mṛgaḥ’ | kiṃ tarhi ? mṛgakartṛko dṛśikarmasaraṇaviśeṣo 'yaṃ tatraikārthatvādekamevedaṃ vāk‍yamityasti dvayostiṅantayorekasmin vāk‍ye sambhavaḥ | tataś‍ca pacati karotītyādāvapi pākaṃ karotītivat sādhyasādhanabhāvena saṃbandho 'styeveti na kaś‍cid virodhaḥ |

anye punarmanyante, kasyacidapi bāhyasya vastvātmano 'saṃbhavād bhāvabhūtavastuśūnyamevedaṃ jagat, tato buddhīnāmeva tathābhūtavyavahāropajanananibandhanatvam | buddhaya eva hi siddhasādhyatārūpamupadarśayantyaḥ śabdāt pravartayanti | tataś‍ca svamahimollā— sitanānāvidhabuddhisamupanītabhedanakālpanikākāraparigato 'yaṃ māyendrajālasadṛśo vyavahāraḥ pravartata iti na kaś‍cidaparaṃ vastu yasya siddhasya sādhyalakṣaṇavirodhāpattiḥ | tathā hi—buddhimākārabhedavatīmeke kriyāṃ manyante | sā hi svamātrābhiraparyavasitaviṣayanirbhāsābhiḥ antastattvādibhiriva bahirarthanibandhanāmarthakriyāṃ sādhayati | na tadarthaṃ darśanābhiniveśo 'smākam ārāddavīyassamutsārayanti pratyayavyaktayo hi parākṛtavāk‍yārthasaṃsparśā bāhyārthavat tāsu tāsvarthakriyāsu yathāsāmarthyamupajāyamānāḥ pratītāśaṅkāviṣayaparigamanādyavasthāsu tadā sāmarthyaṃ kriyāsāmarthye kimarthamanyapadārtharūpamabhyupeyata iti | atra cūrṇī virodhaṃ darśayati; idaṃ kiloktaṃ bhāṣye— kṛdabhihito bhāvaḥ kriyayā samavāyaṃ gacchati, pāko vartata iti; tiṅabhihitastu na gacchati (ma.bhā. 3.1.17) |

na hi bhavati pacati paṭhatīti | atrā 'yaṃ samādhiḥ—yathābhūtā kriyopanyastā tathābhūtā samavāyaṃ na gacchati, viśeṣayossamavāyo, nāsti, sāmānyayorastyeva | asti sa me rocate,
asi tvamīśiṣe, nāsmi rame, bhavati, pacati karotīti | tatraitacchak‍yate vaktuṃ yatrānyā ca kriyā bhavati; yatra tu khalu saiva sā kriyā tatra katham ? yathā bhavedapi bhavet, syādapi syāditi | asti ca loke evaṃbhūtaḥ prayogaḥ | api bhavedetaddevadattasyāpi, sa divasaḥ syādyatredaṃ bhavediti | devadattasya ca vartamānakālāṃ sattāmavināśaṃ prārthayamāna etatprayuṅakte; api bhavedetat, bhaveddevadatta iti | atrāpyanyatvamasti; kutaḥ, sādhanabhedātkālabhedācca | ekasyātra bhavaterbhavati sādhanaṃ sarvakālaś‍ca pratyayaḥ | api bhavedityatra yo bhavati tatra devadattasattā na prakṛtyarthaḥ; kiṃ tarhi ? pratyayārthaḥ; prārthaneva liṅiti sarvakālatvaṃ kālaviśeṣasyānāśritatvāt | ‘aparasya bāhyaṃ sādhanaṃ vartamānakālaś‍ca pratyayo bhavati | tasya bāhyaṃ sādhanaṃ dravyaṃ devadatta ityarthaḥ, devadattasattā tu prakṛtyarthaḥ, vartamānasattā tu devadattas. prārthyata ityanupāttakālaviśeṣaḥ | śās‍tre liṅ svarūpādeva vartamānakāle 'vatiṣṭhate, yathā tavyādayo bhaviṣyati, karttavyaḥ kaṭa iti | svabhāvāc‍cārthānāṃ vyavasthepi bhāṣye kālādhikāraḥ pratyākhyātaḥ | evaṃ syādapi syādityatrāpi svābhāvikaṃ nānātvaṃ sādhanakālabhedena pratipādyata iti |

nanvastyādayo 'pi nipātāḥ, te cākhyātasvarūpatvāt kārakāṇi viśiṃṣantaḥ kālaṃ puruṣaṃ saṃkhyāṃ na vyabhicariṣyanti; yatra vyabhicārastatra katham ? tathā hi— bhavati pakṣyati bhavatyapākṣīdayūyujastvamasīti kālavyabhicāraḥ; bhavatu gacchāmyahamiti puruṣavyabhicāraḥ; bhavatu tayaiva maṇḍūkāḥ pacyantāmiti saṃkhyāvyabhicāraḥ; bhavatu nāma drakṣyasīti kālapuruṣavyabhicāraḥ; bhavatu tayaiva maṇḍūkāḥ pacyantāmiti saṃkhyāvyabhicāraḥ; bhavatu nāma drakṣyasīti kālapuruṣavyabhicāraḥ; bhavatu bhaviṣyanti jīvato dhanānīti kālasaṃkhyāvyabhicāraḥ; astyagamāma ghoṣāditi kālapuruṣasaṃkhyāvyabhicāraḥ | loke caivaṃbhūtā vācoyuktirasti, prayuṅkte hi lokaḥ, asti gacchāmo vayamityevamādiḥ, tatrāstītyekavacanamupalabhyate | tena manyāmahe gamerevaikatvāśrayasya kartṛtvaṃ, na vayamiti bahutvāśrayasya | tadevaṃ sāmānyakriyayā viśeṣakriyāṇāṃ kartṛtvenābhisaṃbandhāt astyanayossādhyasādhanabhāvaḥ | viśeṣakriyāyāmapi k‍vacitkatvena saṃbandho dṛś‍yate— paś‍ya dhāvati, paś‍yāma udāhriyante, manye yāsyasi, smarasi vatsyāmaḥ, na marṣayāmi yājayiṣyati, āśaṃse yukto 'dhīyeti | karaṇādibhāvaś‍ca tiṅantānāṃ ca vidyate, pacati paṭhatīti | atra tu vidyata eva saṃbandhaḥ, sarvanām‍nā parāmarśāt |
na ceha vāk‍yabhedaḥ, sarvathaiva tadanupalabdheḥ | tatra hi khalu vāk‍yabheda upeyate | ta trāsau parāmṛś‍yamāno 'nyāṃ buddhillikhati | na cehollekhavān vāk‍yabhedo buddhāvupalabhyate; tasmādekavāk‍yatvameva | ata evābhijānāsi devadatta yat kaś‍mīreṣu vatsyāmaḥ, tatraudanaṃ bhokṣyāmahe iti ‘vibhāṣā sākāṅkṣe’ (3.2.114) iti sarvanām‍nā parāmarśātsākāṅkṣatvopapatteḥ | tatretyanenāsaṃdhīyamānatvāllaṭo laṅaś‍ca vikalpaḥ pravartate | sa svapityeṣa budhyate, so 'stamayate 'yamudetītyatra tu parasparaṃ vā ākhyātayorlakṣyalakṣaṇabhāvaḥ, saha vā sarvaireva kālaviśeṣādikaṃ lakṣyata ityekaparatvādekavāk‍yataiva | yathā—

hantīti palāyata ityādau tvavasthita eva hetuhetumadbhāva iti na dyotyate; nanvapūrvaṃ kriyate pacati paṭhatītyatrāpi prasaṅgāt | ete tāvadavadhyavadhimadbhāvo yāvadādau samuc‍cayādau cādayaś‍ca vyākhyātāḥ | tadevaṃ sūtrakārasya bhāṣyakārasya ca darśane asti kriyāyāḥ kriyāntareṇa saṃbandhaḥ | vārttikakārastu yuṣmadasmadādeśanighātādyartham, ‘ākhyātaṃ sāvyayakārakaviśeṣaṇaṃ vāk‍yam’ ‘ekatiṅ vāk‍yamiti anyadeva laukikāt pāribhāṣikaṃ vāk‍yalakṣaṇamārabhate | na ca tena laukiko vyavahārassidhyatītyupekṣyate | taduktam—
etena bhinnābhinnapravaktṛkānekavākyopakalpitaikavāk‍yasthānāmapi kriyāṇāṃ parasparamabhisaṃbandho vyākhyātaḥ | sa bhinnapravaktṛkatve yathā—

lg.l: kuśalaṃ tasyā jīvati kuśalaṃ pṛcchāmi jīvatītyuktam |
punarapi tadeva kathayasi mṛtāṃ tu kathayāmi yā śvasiti || 85 ||

l.seg: tigmaṃ dhāma ciraṃ cakāsti divi tat (yat) tatrāsti divyaḥ pumān

div.p: tat tridhā— 1. prastutaṃ, 2. kalpitaṃ, 3. ākasmikaṃ ca | teṣu
(1) prastutaṃ dvidhā— aṅgaṃ varṇakaṃ ca | tayoḥ

lg.l: ito gamiṣyāmyathaveti vādinī śramālasā2 ca stanābhinnavalkalā |
kāmasya puṣpavyatiriktamas‍traṃ bālyāt paraṃ sātha vayaḥ prapede || 90 ||

div.p: (2) kalpitaṃ dvidhā— sābhāsaṃ nirābhāsaṃ ca | tayoḥ

lg.l: tirohitātmā śiśupālasaṃjñayā pratīyate saṃprati so 'pyasaḥ paraiḥ || 94 ||
sa rāvaṇo nāma nikāmabhīṣaṇaṃ babhūva rakṣaḥ kṣatarakṣaṇaṃ divaḥ || 95 ||

div.head: nirābhāsam

lg.l: iyaṃ ca durvāramahārathānāmākṣipya kīrti mahatāṃ balānām |

div.p: ityādiḥ prakaraṇārthaḥ tāpasakirātayuddhavarṇanāyāmanābhāsamānaḥ kāvyakuśalena kavinohāpohadvāreṇopakalpya kathyate |
(3) ākasmikaṃ dvidhā sabījaṃ nirbījaṃ ca | tayoḥ

lg.l: prasvāpanaṃ nāma yataḥ praharturna cārihiṃsā vijayaś‍ca haste || 101 ||

div.head: nirbījam

lg.l: taṃ viniṣpiṣya kākutsthau purā dūṣayati sthalīm |

div.p: ityādeḥ prakaraṇārthasyāgrataḥ phalānupalambhādākasmikasyāpi nirbījatvamavagamyate | tadidamarthatastridhā prakaraṇamabhihitam |

lg.l: yā dāsyamapyasya labheta nārī sā syātkṛtārthā kimutāṅkaśayyām || 110 ||
sevaṃtīṇa ṇa patto tiasa—vahūṇa sịdhilattaṇaṃ aṇurāo || 117 ||

div.p: nanu varṇasamūhaḥ padaṃ, padasamūho vākyaṃ, vākyasamūhaḥ prakaraṇamityācakṣate |

ucyate, ta eva praṣṭavyāḥ uc‍caritapradhvaṃsināmanarthakānāṃ ca varṇānāṃ samūhasya padatvamarthavattayā varṇayantaḥ | vayaṃ tvekārthaparaḥ padasamūho vākyamityeva pratijānīmahe | tatra padairapi vākyamārabhyate, vākyairapi ca prakaraṇamārabhyate, vākyaiḥ padairapi ca prakaraṇaiḥ prabandha ārabhyate | tataś‍ca

l.seg: kanyāyāś‍ca parārthataiva hi matā tasyāḥ pradānādahaṃ

div.p: yadi vākyameva padasamūhaḥ, kathamāha mahāvākyo(kāvyo)paniṣadācāryo daṇḍī—
teṣu cchandogataṃ padyam | chandastu tridhā— akṣaracchando, mātrācchando, gaṇacchandaś‍ceti | tānyapi pratyekaṃ tridhā samārdhasamaviṣamabhedāt | tatra —

lg.l: āśuśśiśāno vṛṣabho na yudhmo ghanāghanaḥ kṣobhaṇaś‍carṣaṇīnām |
bhāgaṃ devebhyo vidadhātyāyan pra candramāstirati dīrghamāyuḥ || 121 ||
na nūnamasti no śvaḥ kastad‍veda yadadbhutam |
vāu na puvvu na pacchimu na vi dakkhiṇu vahaï |
vaṇe na kayaṃbu na aṃbu na pāḍala mahamahaï || 123a ||
(vāyuḥ na pūrvaḥ na paścimaḥ nāpi dakṣiṇaḥ vahati |
vane na kadambaḥ na āmraḥ na pāṭalā gandhaṃ prasārayati ||)
māe na jāṇaü māhahe kevaṃ virahiṇi maraï || 123b ||
mātar na jāne māghe kathaṃ virahiṇi maraï ||)
viṇadīsaï ito isu purisu vasadi jahīte dhuvaṭṭhaharahapa aṭṭhadi || 125 ||
rajojuṣe janmani sattvavṛttaye sthitau prajānāṃ pralaye tamaḥspṛśe |
vapuṣā parameṇa bhūdharāṇāmatha saṃbhāvya parākramaṃ vibhede |

div.p: acchandaḥ padasaṃtāno gadyam | tat‍tridhā vṛttagandhi, cūrṇam, utkalikāprāyaṃ ca | teṣu
anāviddhalalitapadaṃ cūrṇam; tat‍tridhā— gurubahulaṃ, laghubahulaṃ, miśraṃ ceti | tatra

lg.l: ‘mahābhāga! suśliṣṭaguṇatayā ramaṇīya eṣa sanniveśaḥ | kutūhalinī ca no
bhartṛdārikā vartate, yatastasyāmabhinavo vicitraḥ kusumeṣuvyāpāra’ || 133 || iti |

div.head: āviddhavākyam

p.emph: yasya ca madakalakarikumbhapīṭhapāṭanamācarato lag‍nasthūlamuktāphalena dṛḍhamuṣṭinipīḍanānniṣṭhyūtadhārājalabindudantureṇeva kṛpāṇena kṛṣyamāṇā subhaṭoraḥkavāṭapuṭaghaṭitakavacasahasrāndhakāramadhyavarttinī karikaraṭataṭagalitamadajalāsāradurdināsvabhisārikeva samaraniśāsu samīpamasakṛdājagāma rājalakṣmīḥ || 136 ||

div.p: tadetat‍trividhamapi ākhyāyikāsu kathāsu madhumallikādiṣu ca dṛśyate |
gadyapadyavyāyogo miśram | tat‍tridhā padyapradhānaṃ, gadyapradhānaṃ, tulyarūpaṃ ceti | teṣu—
tulyarūpamapi tridhaiva sajātīyābhyāṃ, vijātīyābhyāṃ, sajātīyavijātīyābhyāṃ ceti |

nanu ca varṇasamūhaśśabda iti vaktavye kimarthamucyate prakṛtyādayaśśabdā iti? yadāha ka: punaśśabda iti praś‍ne gakāraukāravisarjanīyā iti bhagavānupavarṣaḥ | naivam; arthāvasāyaprasavanimittaṃ śabda iṣyate | atha gauriti na prasavanimitteṣu jātikriyāguṇadravyādīnām |
kaḥ śabdaḥ, yenoc‍cāritena arthaḥ pratīyate, tarhi varṇā eva śabdaḥ | uc‍cāriteṣu hi gakāraukāravisarjanīyeṣu gauriti sās‍nādimānarthaḥ pratīyate, satyametat | kintu varṇāḥ pratyayanimittamekaśo vā syuḥ, samuditā vā | na tāvadekaśaḥ, dvitīyādivarṇoc‍cāraṇavaiyarthyaprasaṅgāt | nāpi samuditāḥ utpattipakṣe yaugapadyenānutpatteḥ, utpannasya ca kṣaṇādūrdhvamanavasthānāt | abhivyaktipakṣe krameṇaivābhivyakteḥ abhivyakt‍yantarameva ca vāyubhistirodhānāt kathaṃ samudāyaḥ ? ekasmṛtyupārụ̄dhānāṃ ca varṇānāṃ vācakatve kramasmaraṇe niyamanimittābhāvāt | uktakrameṇa ca smaraṇadarśanāt saro, rasa iti pratīteraviśeṣaḥ prāp‍noti | vaktṛbhede cārthapratyayaprasaṅgaḥ | uto na varṇāśśabdaḥ, kintu varṇasamūhabhivyaṅgyasphoṭalakṣaṇoktārthātmā śabda iti | sa eva sphuṭatyasmādartha ityarthāvasāyaprasavanimittamiṣyate | kathaṃ tarhi śabdaṃ kuru, mā śabdaṃ kārṣīḥ, śabdakāryayaṃ māṇavaka iti dhvaniṃ kurvan‍nucyate? abhivyañjakābhivyaṅgyayorabhedopacārāt | nanvabhivyañjakatve 'pi na varṇānāmarthavattā bhavitumarhatīti? naivam, varṇasamūhātmano dhvanerevābhivyañjakatvāt | kiṃ punarvarṇāssarvathaiva nārthavantaḥ ? pṛthak‍tvena tāvannārthavantaḥ, na hi prativarṇamarthā upapadyante |

nanu ca dhātuprātipadikapratyayanipāteṣūpalabhyante— dhātuṣu iṇ—eti, ṛ—iyartīti; prātipadikeṣu aḥ śārṅgī, uḥ brahmeti, u upaskaroti | naite varṇāḥ, api tu śabdābhivyaktihetava ekavarṇā ekadhvanihetavaśśabdaśabdavācyāḥ | na tūpacārato 'pi varṇasamūhaśśabdaḥ | naivam, arthābhivyaktihetuśśabdaḥ, śabdābhivyaktiheturdhvaniḥ | sa tu kaś‍cidekavarṇaḥ; ekasminneva vā samūhāropaṇaṃ sāmarthyātiśayād, yathaikāpūpīti | yadi hyekasminnapūpe samūho nāropyate, samūhābhāvādekāpūpa ityeva syāt, na tvekāpūpīti | kathaṃ punarekasmin samūhāropaṇam ? vyapadeśivadbhāvāt | anyathā 'iyāya āra' ityādau prathamatvaikāc‍tvayorabhāvād dvirvacanābhāvaḥ | yadyevamanye 'pi varṇāssamūhāropaṇenaiva dhvanayo bhavitumarhanti | nārhanti | kutaḥ? śabdaśaktisvābhāvyāt | yathā samānamīhamānānāmadhīyānānāṃ ca kecidarthairyujyante kecinna yujyante; tathā dhātuprātipadikapratyayanipātā evaikavarṇāssamūhāropaṇenaivārthavattvāya dhvanivyapadeśaṃ labhante, na punaranye | svābhāvikaṃ caitat; na ca svabhāvāḥ paryanuyogamarhanti |

itastarhyarthavanto varṇāḥ | varṇavyatyaye varṇaviparyaye varṇāpāye varṇopajane varṇavikāre vā 'rthāntaraṃ gamyate | varṇavyatyaye kūpaḥ, sūpaḥ, yūpa iti | varṇaviparyaye kalamaḥ, lamakaḥ, malaka iti | varṇāpāye maśakaḥ, śakaka iti | varṇopajane akṣaḥ, plakṣaḥ, pakṣa iti | varṇavikāre nīraṃ, nīlaṃ nīḍamiti | tatra kūpa iti sakakāreṇa kaś‍cidartho gamyate, sūpa iti sakāravyatyaye 'rthāntaraṃ, yūpa iti tu sakārasya kakārasya vā yakārasya vyatyaye kūpāt
sūpāc‍cārthāntaramiti | tena manyāmahe yaḥ kūpe kūpārthassa kakārasya, yassūpe sūpārthassa sakārasya, yo yūpe yūpārthassa yakārasyeti | yadi tu samudāyasyāyamartho bhavet, kūpādisamudāyassa yūpādiṣu bhūyastvādbhūyiṣṭhaḥ kūpārthassūpe syāt; sūpārthaś‍ca kūpe, kūpārthaś‍ca yūpe, yūpārthaś‍ca sūpa iti; evaṃ varṇaviparyaye 'pi kramotkramayossamudāyāviśeṣāt, kamalaḥ malakaḥ, lamaka iti pratyayāviśeṣaḥ prāp‍noti; na hi trastebhyo vaṭaparicchede palāśataḥ khadirato vā na avadhāraṇe samudāyasya bhedo bhavati | varṇāpāye 'pyekādyavayavavirahe samudāyasyānanyatvāt maśakaḥ, śakaka iti nārthāntaraṃ gamyeta | bhinnakarṇapuccho 'pi śvā śvaiva, nāśvatara iti | varṇopajane 'pyakṣaḥ, plakṣa iti pratyayaviśeṣo na syāt | na hi sūnodbhede keśodgame vā yuvativyakteranyatā yuktimatī | evaṃ varṇavikāro 'pi nīraṃ, nīlaṃ nīḍamiti nārthāntarapratītirjāyeta | na hyapalite palitavati rañjitakeśapāśe vā viṣṇumitrādeḥ svarūpānyatvaṃ bhavati | varṇavyatyayaviparyayāpāyopajanavikāreṣu cārthāntaradarśanānmanyāmahe arthavanto varṇā iti | varṇārthavatve varṇavyatyayaviparyayāpāyopajanavikārāḥ kāraṇamarthāntaropalabdherjānte |

atrāpi brumaḥ — ya ete tvayā varṇānāmarthavattāyāṃ hetava upanyastā varṇavyatyayādayaḥ, teṣu kūpassūpo yūpa iti saṅghātāntarāṇyevaite, arthāntare ca vartante | yadi hi varṇavyatyayādikṛtamarthāntaragamanaṃ syāt, bhūyiṣṭhaḥ, kūpārthassūpe syāt, kakāramātrasyaiva vyatyayāt | sūpārthaś‍ca kūpa iti samānaṃ pūrveṇa | yatastu na kiṃcit kūpādināṃ sūpādiṣvato 'nvayābhāvānmanyāmahe saṅghātāntarāṇyevaitānyarthāntareṣu vartanta iti | etena varṇaviparyayādayo 'pi vyākhyātāḥ | tānyapi hi arthāntaravartīni saṅghātāntarāṇyeveti | idaṃ khalvapi bhavatā varṇānāmarthavattāṃ bruvatā sādhīyo 'narthakatvaṃ dyotitam | yo hi manyate yaḥ kūpe kūpārthaḥ sa kakārasya, ūpaśabdastasyānarthakaḥ syāt |

nanu ca samudāyasyārthavattve samudāyaikadeśavināśe samudāyasya kāraṇabhāve kāryābhāva iti vināśo vābhyupeyate; chinnakarṇapucchaśvanyāyādapi vināśo vā | kiṃcātaḥ ? vināśapakṣe samudāyābhāvādarthābhāvaprasaṅgaḥ | pakṣāntare 'pi sa evārtho, na tvarthāntaram; tataś‍ca kathaṃ ślokaḥ, śokaḥ, lokaḥ, okaḥ, kaḥ, ityarthāntarapratītiḥ ? uktamatra— samudāyāntarāṇyevaitānyarthāntareṣu vartante | bhavedetat, yatrārthāntaraṃ gamyate; yatra tu sa eva so 'rthastatra katham? yathā udakaṃ, dakaṃ, kam iti | imānyapi saṅghātāntarāṇyevaikārthavṛttīni; yathā kanduḥ koṣṭhaḥ, kusūla iti | kramāttasya cārthavattāṃ bruvatā tvayaiva dakārokārayorānarthakyamuktaṃ bhavati | kaś‍caivamāha ? varṇavyatyayaviparyayāpāyopajanavikāreṣvarthāntaradarśanameva; yataḥ ś‍yāmā, rāmā, vāmā iti varṇavyatyayo nārthavyatyayaḥ | tarkuḥ, sikatā, siṃha iti varṇaviparyayo nārthaviparyayaḥ |
santi, gh‍nantīti, syanti, varṇāpāyo nārthāpāyaḥ | āsthāt, avocat, sañcaskāreti varṇopajane nārthopajanaḥ | ghātayati, kṣiṇoti, ropayatīti varṇavikāro nārthavikāraḥ | tena manyāmahe varṇavyatyayādiṣvapyanarthāntaragamanādanarthakā eva varṇā iti |

itastarhyarthavanto varṇāḥ; yadeṣāṃ saṅghātā arthavantaḥ | yeṣāṃ hyavayavā arthavantasta eva samudāyādarthavantaḥ; tadyathā— ekaś‍cakṣuṣmān paś‍yati, tatsamudāyaśśatamapi paś‍yati | ekatilastailaṃ prasūte, tatsamudāyaḥ khārīśatamapi prasūte | yeṣāṃ punaravayavā nārthavantastatsamudāyā api nārthavantaḥ | tadyathā eko 'ndho na paś‍yati, śatamapyandhānāṃ na paś‍yati | ekā sikatā tailaṃ na prasūte, tatsamudāyaḥ khārīśatamapi na prasūta iti | naivam, atadarthenāpyavayavenāvayavino 'rthasadbhāvo dṛśyate | yathā eka ūrṇātantuḥ śītatrāṇāsamarthaḥ, tatsamudāyaś‍ca kambalaḥ samarthaḥ; ekastaṇḍulaḥ kṣutpratighāte 'samarthaḥ, tatsamudāyaś‍ca annapūrṇaṃ piṭharādi pātram | manuḥ 3.224 |vardhitakaṃ samarthamiti | naivaṃ bhavati | tatra pratyekamapi kiyatyapyarthamātrā; ime punarvarṇā atyantāyaivānarthakāḥ | yathā tarhi rathāṅgāni vihitāni tāni pratyekaṃ nanakāraṃ rāghavo na paṭhati HOS 200 vrajikriyāsamarthāni, tatsamudāyaś‍ca rathassamartha iti | evameṣāṃ varṇānāṃ samudāyāśśabdābhivyaktihetavo 'rthavantaḥ, avayavāstvanarthakā iti |
ataḥ sthitametat prakṛtipratyayādivarṇajanitadhvanisamūho 'bhivyaṅgyasphoṭalakṣaṇo 'rthātmā 'rthāvasāyaprasavanimittaṃ śabdaḥ | tad‌viśeṣāś‍ca prakṛtyādisphoṭaḥ padasphoṭo vāk‍yasphoṭa iti |
